name: Charmy Studio Porto
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
São Domingos Residences 1 is a recently renovated apartment in the centre of Porto, 400 metres from Ribeira Square and 300 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Clerigos Tower is 700 metres from the apartment and Oporto Coliseum is 1.2 km away.

The apartment is fitted with a cable flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from São Domingos Residences 1.

name: Renaissance Porto Lapa Hotel
description:
COZY ALMADA by HOSTY is a recently renovated apartment in the centre of Porto, 600 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 600 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. The property was built in 1983 and features accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum.

The spacious apartment has a terrace, 1 bedroom, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven. A TV with cable channels is offered.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near COZY ALMADA by HOSTY include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Village Aparthotel By BOA
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 20m²
description:
Downtown PortoEdition provides accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property is around 400 metres from Ribeira Square, 600 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 600 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a toaster, a coffee machine, a a bath or shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units are fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom, while selected rooms have a balcony and some have inner courtyard views. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Downtown PortoEdition include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: The Downtown Charming Apartments
description:
Situated in downtown Porto, this hotel is a 6-minute walk from shopping on Rua de Santa Catarina. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with satellite TV. Private outdoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles.

Rooms at the Tryp Oporto Centro Hotel have parquet floors and modern wood furnishings. They come equipped with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature an elliptic bicycle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Guests of Hotel Tryp can benefit from the laundry and dry cleaning services. Staff at the 24-hour front desk assist with car hire and offer information on local attractions.

Hotel Tryp Oporto Centro is situated 550 metres from the Marques Subway Station, and is a 5-minute walk from several restaurants serving traditional Portuguese cuisine.

name: Musical View
description:
Set in Porto, 1.8 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, Renaissance Porto Lapa Hotel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Renaissance Porto Lapa Hotel include Sao Bento Train Station, Music House and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Fontinha Porto, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
description:
Set in Porto, 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, YOTEL Porto offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain units at the property feature a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At YOTEL Porto all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from YOTEL Porto.

name: COZY ALMADA by HOSTY
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, Casas do Rivoli is a sustainable accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. There is parking on-site and the property provides an electric vehicle charging station.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a bidet and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Casas do Rivoli, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casas do Rivoli
description:
Located in Porto and within 800 metres of Carneiro Beach, Portie Deluxe Suites by DA'HOME features a restaurant, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1 km from Ingleses Beach, 1.7 km from Molhe Beach and 4.2 km from Boavista Roundabout. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a sea view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Portie Deluxe Suites by DA'HOME each room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Music House is 4.7 km from Portie Deluxe Suites by DA'HOME, while Clerigos Tower is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Indulge Porto Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 56m²
description:
This apartment complex in Porto is in the city’s business district, near Carolina Michaëlis Metro Station. It offers a terrace, a gym and apartments with a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The chic, contemporary apartments at Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace lead onto balconies. In the living room, guests can enjoy some cable TV on the plasma TV.

Meals prepared in the fully equipped kitchens can be served in the dining area. Modern bathrooms have under-floor heating.

The Apartments also offers a spacious terrace where guests can relax with drinks. A gym featuring modern equipment is also available.

Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace is just a 10-minute walk from the Praça Mouzinho de Albuquerque.

name: PortoBay Flores
description:
Hotel Cristal Porto is a new 4-star hotel in a central location in Porto. Set right next to Lapa Church, the hotel is 900 metres from Aliados Avenue.

Modern rooms vary from Standard to Deluxe and Suites. Each one includes air conditioning, mini-bar, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Free WiFi is offered.

A garden gives guests the tranquility away from the hustle and bustle of the city. A buffet restaurant is available, as well as a bar where Port wine can be tasted. Breakfast is served from 07:30 to 10:30.

The 24-hour reception can help guests with car rental, luggage storage and transport options. There are 2 multifunction rooms for events.

Guests can leave their car at the 24-hour parking (with extra costs). Cristal Porto Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Faria Guimarães Metro Station, and São Bento Train Station is 2 km away. Porto International Airport is 14 km.

name: TRYP by Wyndham Porto Centro Hotel
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 15m²
description:
Offering an outdoor pool, which may be covered and heated during cold weather, 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence is set in Porto, at just 300 metres from the Combatentes Metro Station and a 6-minute metro ride from Aliados Avenue. It is within a centenary building in Porto, which was fully renovated in 2017, featuring wood and stone details.

Free WiFi is available. Various supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants, shops and cafes can be found within walking distance.

Estadio do Dragao is 1.1 km away. São João General Hospital is 1.7 km from 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence, while City Market Bolhao is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: ICON Duplo Ribeira
description:
Located in Porto’s historic centre, 100 metres from Avenida dos Aliados and the Metro station, this hotel offers art déco-style interiors, a multilingual staff and a spacious terrace. The Douro River is 15 minutes’ walk away.

All rooms at Pão de Açúcar Hotel feature double-glazed windows, vintage furnishings and include a private bathroom. Every room has air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar, and some rooms also feature a terrace.

Breakfast is served daily, guests can enjoy it in the breakfast room or on the terrace, which overlooks the historical Porto City Hall building. There are many restaurants and bars within a few minutes’ walk.

Guests can relax with a book borrowed from the hotel’s library, or visit the old toy and retro collection, with vintage bumper cars from the 70's. From Pão de Açúcar, you can enjoy a short walk to the Port Wine Cellars and taste some of the world-famous Port Wine. Sao Bento Railway Station is 500 metres away.

Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is a 15-minute drive away, and 30 minutes by metro. Car parking is available nearby for an additional fee.

name: YOTEL Porto
description:
Moreira Terrace provides accommodation within 1.1 km of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. It is located 1.2 km from Oporto Coliseum and features a shared kitchen. The guest house features family rooms.

Each unit comes with a fridge, stovetop, a coffee machine, as well as a kitchenware and kettle. Some accommodation includes a terrace and a satellite TV, as well as seating area. At the guest house, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Campanha Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Moreira Terrace.

name: One Shot Palácio Cedofeita
description:
Set in Porto, less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 600 metres from the centre, Village Aparthotel By BOA offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. This recently renovated aparthotel is located less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 9-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The aparthotel provides guests with a patio, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with fruits, juice and cheese are available every morning at the aparthotel. A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

The aparthotel has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near Village Aparthotel By BOA include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Cristal Porto
description:
Situated in Porto and with Clerigos Tower reachable within 1.1 km, One Shot Palácio Cedofeita features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property has a year-round outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden.

At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at One Shot Palácio Cedofeita have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near One Shot Palácio Cedofeita include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace
description:
Boasting a bar, Fontinha Porto, Trademark Collection by Wyndham is situated in Porto in the Norte Region region, 1.3 km from Oporto Coliseum and 1.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

Sao Bento Train Station is 1.4 km from the hotel, while Clerigos Tower is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Fontinha Porto, Trademark Collection by Wyndham.

name: São Domingos Residences 1
description:
Well located in Porto, PortoBay Flores provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a restaurant. Ideally located in the União de Freguesias do Centro district, this hotel offers a bar, as well as a hammam. The hotel features an indoor pool, sauna and room service.

Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

Guests at PortoBay Flores can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking English and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from PortoBay Flores.

name: 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Charmy Studio Porto is located in Porto. The property is set 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower, 1.4 km from Boavista Roundabout and 1.9 km from Palacio da Bolsa. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Music House. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Charmy Studio Porto.

name: GuestReady - Le Jardin Secret
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
In the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, close to Sao Bento Metro Station, GuestReady - Le Jardin Secret features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is located 2.7 km from Palacio da Bolsa, 1.9 km from Ribeira Square and 3.5 km from Campanha Train Station. The property is less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum, and within 900 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from GuestReady - Le Jardin Secret.

name: ABC Hotel Porto - Boavista
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 43m²
description:
The Downtown Charming Apartments offers accommodation within 800 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located 600 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.8 km from Campanha Train Station. The apartment has private entrance.

Each unit is fitted with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from The Downtown Charming Apartments.

name: Portie Deluxe Suites by DA'HOME
description:
Art Magellan by Alojamento Ideal has a balcony and is located in Porto, within just 1.6 km of Campanha Train Station and 1.5 km of Oporto Coliseum. The property is situated 1.9 km from Estadio do Dragao, 3.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 3.7 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from FC Porto Museum.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Clerigos Tower is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Ribeira Square is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Art Magellan by Alojamento Ideal.

name: Downtown PortoEdition
description:
Located in Porto, 400 metres from Music House, ABC Hotel Porto - Boavista provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a city view.

Boavista Roundabout is 400 metres from the hotel, while Clerigos Tower is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 12 km from ABC Hotel Porto - Boavista.

name: Pao de Acucar Hotel
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, ICON Duplo Ribeira is situated 200 metres from Ribeira Square and 400 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer city views. At ICON Duplo Ribeira the rooms have bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ferreira Borges Market, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from ICON Duplo Ribeira.

name: Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Musical View are apartments located in the centre of Porto, 500 metres from the Boavista Garden and the Casa da Música. They offer free WiFi and a panoramic view overlooking the city.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms and are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, sofas and a dining area. Featuring a balcony, each apartment has 1 or 2 bathrooms and is accessible by elevator.

Guests staying at Musical View apartments will be able to prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchen available in each apartment. Alternatively guests can visit the traditional Portuguese restaurants located within 400 metres.

The Casa da Música Metro Station is a 6-minute walk away connecting guests to every part of Porto and surroundings. The Avenida dos Aliados is 3 km away and the Clérigos Tower is a 8-minute drive away. The Douro River and the Ribeira area are 3.8 km away. Porto International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Art Magellan by Alojamento Ideal
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Indulge Porto Flats is a sustainable apartment in the centre of Porto, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment provides city views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. Some units include a balcony and/or a patio with garden views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

Popular points of interest near Indulge Porto Flats include Oporto Coliseum, Music House and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Moreira Terrace
description:
Situated a 1-minute walk from Boavista Avenue, the Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa offers spacious rooms and a modern spa.

The design guest rooms of the Sheraton Porto are decorated with a mix of wood, steel and glass. They come with a minibar, seating area and bathtub.

With the spa's 8 treatment rooms and indoor pool, guests can unwind completely after a busy day. Apart from a yoga studio, it offers various classes, a relaxation area and juice bar.

Guests can enjoy traditional Portuguese cuisine in the restaurant and complement their dinner with a tasty glass of wine. The hotel lobby’s piano bar offers pretty views of the hotel garden. The SL floor includes free Wi-Fi access.

The Sheraton Porto is situated 15 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport. The Casa da Música Concert Hall and its adjacent metro station are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Internacional Porto
description:
Occupying a 19th-century building in Porto’s historical centre, Hotel Internacional features traditional Portuguese décor and an award-winning restaurant serving local gastronomy. The wine cellar houses a cosy bar.

Rooms at the Hotel Internacional Porto have floor-to-ceiling, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a tub. Each room also has a satellite TV.

A daily breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s dining room, while Restaurant O Almada offers traditional flavours from Portugal. Guests can sample regional wines at O Almadinha Bar, as well as quick meals.

São Bento Train Station, at only 300 metres, offers easy connection to Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport. Aliados Metro Station is just 2 minutes’ walk away and there is a paid parking garage 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Lindo Vale Guest House
description:
Boasting a shared lounge and views of city, Lindo Vale Guest House is a sustainable guest house set in Porto, 2.4 km from FC Porto Museum. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from Oporto Coliseum. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the guest house, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

A baby safety gate is also available for guests at the guest house.

Sao Bento Metro Station is 3.5 km from Lindo Vale Guest House, while Estadio do Dragao is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: AC Hotel Porto by Marriott
description:
A 5-minute walk from Estadio do Dragão Metro Station, the modern AC Hotel Porto offers a fitness room, sauna and business centre. With a 24-hour front desk, it has free WiFi in public areas.

Decorated in contrasting colours, each bright and spacious room includes floor-to-ceiling curtains. They offer air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and minibar. The private bathrooms provide free toiletries.

The AC Hotel Porto is situated 4 km from the Campanhã Train Station, which offers connections to Lisbon and Vigo in Galicia, Spain. Porto’s Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 12 km away.

name: Porto Formosa Central Lofts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
Conveniently set in Porto, Porto Formosa Central Lofts provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property is close to popular attractions like Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square.

All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and fully equipped kitchen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from Porto Formosa Central Lofts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casas do Rivoli
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, Casas do Rivoli is a sustainable accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. There is parking on-site and the property provides an electric vehicle charging station.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a bidet and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Casas do Rivoli, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Catalonia Porto
description:
Conveniently situated in the centre of Porto, Catalonia Porto provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. With a garden, the property also features a terrace, as well as a restaurant. Guests can make use of a bar.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room has a safety deposit box, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer garden views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Guests at Catalonia Porto can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Portuguese.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Catalonia Porto.

name: GA Palace Hotel & Spa, a XIXth-Century Villa
description:
GA Palace Hotel & Spa, a XIXth-Century Villa has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Porto. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as an outdoor swimming pool.

At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has a coffee machine, while some rooms include a balcony and others also boast city views. At GA Palace Hotel & Spa, a XIXth-Century Villa all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near GA Palace Hotel & Spa, a XIXth-Century Villa include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lounge Inn Guest House
description:
Featuring a terrace and free WiFi, Lounge Inn Guest House is situated in Porto, 2.2 km from City Market Bolhao and 2.7 km from Oporto Coliseum. 3.2 km from Lello Bookshop. Attractions in the area include Paris Galleries Street, 3.3 km away, or Estadio do Dragao, located 4.1 km from the property.

All rooms in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Lounge Inn Guest House also feature a seating area.

The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Suite na baixa do Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 58m²
description:
Featuring garden views, Suite na baixa do Porto is situated in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 1.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.6 km from Sao Bento Train Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling and pub crawls are possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Popular points of interest near Suite na baixa do Porto include Music House, Boavista Roundabout and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Santa Catarina Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 55m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, 300 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 700 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, Santa Catarina Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

All rooms are set in wooden boxes and include a private bathroom and a walk-in shower. Rooms feature air conditioning and have no TV. Only some rooms offer a window. Free WiFi is available throughout.

An optional à lá carte breakfast is available and may be served until 19:00. Guests can grab a drink or a meal at the top floor City Club restaurant/bar and relax on the rooftop terrace which includes a tank where guests can dive and listen to music underwater.

O Carniceiro restaurant and the Big Bad Bank bar are located on the bottom floor and offer a welcoming atmosphere where guests can pick a book from the on-site library. A sauna is also available.

The Ribeira Square and D. Luís I Bridge are 2 km away while Coliseu do Porto is 700 metres from Zero Box Lodge Porto. Porto International Airport is 17 km away.

Popular points of interest near Exe Essenzia Porto include Boavista Roundabout, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

situated in Porto's historic centre, Rua de Trás Apartments is 130 metres from the Clérigos Church.

 All rooms include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine. one of the rooms feature a balcony with a view.

name: Hotel Aliados
description:
Situated in a historic building overlooking Aliados Avenue in the Porto centre, this hotel is just 50 metres from the Aliados Metro Station. The downstairs restaurant at Hotel Aliados is the emblematic Café Guarany, which also has nightly live music.

The Hotel Aliados' bright and comfortably furnished rooms feature large soundproofed windows with city views. Each is equipped with modern amenities including satellite TV and air conditioning. A private bathroom with free toiletries is included in each unit. Some rooms also have private balconies.

Guests can spend a night at the downstairs Café-Restaurant Guarany, which serves international cuisine. The schedule of live music rotates each night and includes traditional Portuguese fado singers. The surrounding area features a ariety of restaurants, most serving the popular and rich Porto cuisine.

The hotel’s tour desk is available to assist with car rental or in scheduling a day trip to Portugal’s Douro River region. Hotel reception is available 24 hours a day.

At just 400 metres is the pedestrian street of Santa Catarina, which houses a wide range of shops and boutiques. Porto's riverside, the Ribeira, is a UNESCO World Heritage site and is a 10-minute walk away. Scenic Parque de Serralves, home of Porto’s Museum of Contemporary Art, is just 3 km from Hotel Aliados. Porto's International Airport is a 30-minute drive away and is also reachable via metro.

name: Axis Porto Business & Spa Hotel
description:
Axis Porto Hotel is situated beside Porto University campus, 3 km from the UNESCO World Heritage Centre of Porto. The hotel features a spa centre and panoramic city views.

All guest rooms at the Axis Porto feature satellite TV, minibar and air conditioning. In addition, the hotel rooms all have balconies.

The hotel’s modern spa is equipped with a dynamic pool, sauna, Turkish baths and shower. A full range of relaxation and massage treatments is available.

The restaurant at Hotel Axis Porto offers a fusion of Italian and international cuisine. There is also a living room and a terrace with a bar, where guests can relax with a drink.

Axis Porto Business & Spa Hotel is located just 15 minutes’ drive from Porto International Airport. The nearest Metro station is 900 metres away, and on-site car parking is also available.

Axis is taking part in an initiative of corporate social responsibility, integrating into its team people with intellectual disabilities.

name: Acta The Clover
description:
Located 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, Acta The Clover offers 4-star accommodation in Porto and features a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Acta The Clover each room comes with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Acta The Clover include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Vila Gale Porto - Centro
description:
This 4-star, central Porto hotel is 300 metres from Campo 24 Agosto Metro Station. Vila Gale Porto offers a health club with an indoor swimming pool. The Rua de Santa Catarina commercial district is 10 minutes' walk.

The spacious rooms and suites at Vila Gale Porto are air-conditioned and feature a bright décor. All come with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and a private bathroom, including a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Vila Gale Porto’s Paris – Texas Restaurant serves Portuguese cuisine and pasta. Room service is available 24/7, at an extra cost. Guests can enjoy wine from the hotel’s vineyard Casa de Santa Vitória, at one of the 2 bars. A billiards room is also on site.

Vila Gale’s Health Club features an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub, turkish bath, solarium, vichy shower, massage treatments and fitness centre with views over Porto city. WiFi is available in all areas of the hotel.

Central Aliados Avenue is 1.4 km away, while the Clérigos Tower 1.6 km away. Dom Luis I Bridge is 1.6 km away and is next to Ribeira and the Port Wine Cellars. Galerias de Paris, Porto's main bar area, are a 10-minute drive.

Campanhã Railway Station is 1 km away. The hotel is located 15 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, and has direct access to Porto Metro system.

name: Torel Avantgarde
description:
Torel Avantgarde is set in Porto's centre, a 10-minute walk from the Douro riverside and 750 metres from the iconic Clérigos Church. The 3-time award-winning 5-star hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a garden, as well as panoramic views over the city.

This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Cristal Palace Gardens and the Lello Bookshop. Paris Galleries Street is a 10-minute walk from Torel Avantgarde, while Ferreira Borges Market is a 15-minute walk away. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 18 km from the property.

description:

The apartments are 400 metres from Avenida dos Aliados and 1 km from the Clérigos Tower. Dom Luís I Bridge, next to the Ribeira and the Port Wine Cellars, is 1.6 km away. Trindade Train Station is 1 km away and Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 15 km away.

Guests can enjoy a glass of port wine in the lobby bar, which is open from 10:30 to 01:00. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception desk can arrange car rental and facilitate the on-site business centre.

The famous Casa da Musica is only a 5-minute walk, while Sá Carneiro Airport is 12 km away. A tourist bus and public transport is conveniently available just outside Portus Cale.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dishwasher, a kettle, a bidet, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms have a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from 4-Suites Batalha Residence & SIZE Flats Batalha.

name: SIZE Flats Clérigos
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
SIZE Flats Clérigos provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This sustainable apartment is located 500 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 500 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. The apartment features family rooms.

All units are equipped with a toaster, fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near SIZE Flats Clérigos include Clerigos Tower, Oporto Coliseum and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Portofoz
description:
Located on the Foz do Douro district, only a stone’s throw from the Atlantic Ocean, this guest house offers guests cosy accommodation with sea views.

Combining rustic décor with friendly service, Residencial Portofoz makes the most of its central location. Marvel at sea views while enjoying breakfast in bed. If you wish, you can also surf the internet in the comfort of your room.

The attentive staff is at your service 24 hours per day and happy to direct you to the parking lot nearby.  The staff can also help you to organise your journey through Caminho de Santiago de Compostela.

 After a long day of travelling or sightseeing, the bar is the perfect spot to have a refreshing drink and meet other guests.

name: Three Magi Residence
description:
A sustainable property, Three Magi Residence is located in Porto near Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. It is situated 1.3 km from Palacio da Bolsa and provides a lift. The property is 600 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The units at the guest house are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the guest house, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the guest house.

A car rental service is available at Three Magi Residence.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and D. Luis I Bridge. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Three Magi Residence, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Stay Hotel Porto Centro Trindade
description:
Centrally located in Porto, Stay Hotel Porto Centro Trindade is a 3-star accommodation at a 5-minute walk from Trindade Metro Station and 10 minutes from Aliados Avenue. The Bolhão market is at 600 metres, while the iconic Clérigos Church is at a 20-minute walk.

Free WiFi is included and all rooms are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV. Each room also has a kettle, wardrobe and air conditioning. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer.

A continental or buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. A wide range of restaurants is available in the vicinity, many within a 5 to 10-minute walk. Among the city's gastronomic specialities is the famed Francesinha.

At 300 metres is the start of the pedestrian portion of Santa Catarina Street, a renowned shopping street which also houses the emblematic Majestic Café. At a 15-minute walk are the Paris Galleries, a popular nighttime hotspot, filled with bars and cafés.  Porto's Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 16 km from the property and is reachable via metro.

name: Eurostars Porto Douro
description:
The 4-star Eurostars Porto Douro is located in the city of Porto facing the Douro River, just a 3-minute walk from the UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira and the D. Luís I Bridge. It offers free WiFi throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are elegantly decorated and some offer unique views of the Douro River. Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a telephone and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning and, upon request, breakfast may be served in the room. Within walking distance, guests will find a variety of restaurants serving traditional local cuisine as well as a plenty of bars and snack-bars. In addition, the hotel features a bar where guests can relax in the evening.

With a 24-hour front desk providing a variety of services and information, The Eurostars Porto Douro also features 3 meeting rooms, ideal for conferences and business events. Massage services are available upon request.

Eurostars Porto Douro is conveniently located a 10-minute walk from Port Wine Cellars across the Douro River and 1.4 km from the iconic Clérigos Tower and the unique Lello Bookstore. The São Bento Train Station is 950 metres away and Porto International Airport is 15 km away.

name: Art Magellan by Alojamento Ideal
description:
Art Magellan by Alojamento Ideal has a balcony and is located in Porto, within just 1.6 km of Campanha Train Station and 1.5 km of Oporto Coliseum. The property is situated 1.9 km from Estadio do Dragao, 3.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 3.7 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from FC Porto Museum.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Clerigos Tower is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Ribeira Square is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Art Magellan by Alojamento Ideal.

name: Hotel Cristo Rei
description:
Attractively located in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, Hotel Cristo Rei is situated 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 2.2 km from Campanha Train Station. Each accommodation at the 1-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a bar. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum.

At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer, rooms at Hotel Cristo Rei also boast free WiFi, while some rooms include a balcony.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Hotel Cristo Rei, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Duerming Republik Aparthotel
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Duerming Republik Aparthotel is located in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 2 km from Music House, 1.8 km from Boavista Roundabout and 1.2 km from Oporto Coliseum. It is situated 1.1 km from Sao Bento Train Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.1 km away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, microwave, toaster and a fridge. Kitchenware and coffee machine are also available. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from Duerming Republik Aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pestana Porto - A Brasileira, City Center & Heritage Building
description:
Pestana Porto - A Brasileira, City Center & Heritage Building is a brand new 5-star property in downtown Porto, just a 4-minute walk from Aliados Avenue. The historic São Bento Train Station is a mere 240 metres away.

With individually-controled air conditioning, all room come furnished in an elegant and modern style. Each includes a flat-screen TV, work desk and private safe. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Pestana Porto - A Brasileira, City Center & Heritage Building. At the accommodation guests will find a restaurant serving Portuguese cuisine. The surrounding area is home to a wide range of popular restaurants and eateries.

Pestana Porto - A Brasileira, City Center & Heritage Building offers a fitness centre. Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

At 300 metres from City Market Bolhao, the property is a 5-minute walk from Paris Galleries Street and 500 metres from Clerigos Tower. The hotel is set a 9-minute walk from Ferreira Borges Market and 800 metres from the Douro River. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Casa Familiar do Porto
description_short: Entire holiday home • 5 bedrooms • 2 living rooms • 4 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 300m²
description:
Set 1.6 km from FC Porto Museum, Casa Familiar do Porto offers accommodation with a garden, barbecue facilities and a 24-hour front desk for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property.

The lodge provides guests with a terrace, garden views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Estadio do Dragao is 1.5 km from Casa Familiar do Porto, while Campanha Train Station is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: viterbo'8 - The Artists House
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 54m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, viterbo'8 - The Artists House is a sustainable accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. It is located 300 metres from Ribeira Square and features a lift. The bed and breakfast also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service.

The units at the bed and breakfast come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near viterbo'8 - The Artists House include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Musical View
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Musical View are apartments located in the centre of Porto, 500 metres from the Boavista Garden and the Casa da Música. They offer free WiFi and a panoramic view overlooking the city.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms and are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, sofas and a dining area. Featuring a balcony, each apartment has 1 or 2 bathrooms and is accessible by elevator.

Guests staying at Musical View apartments will be able to prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchen available in each apartment. Alternatively guests can visit the traditional Portuguese restaurants located within 400 metres.

The Casa da Música Metro Station is a 6-minute walk away connecting guests to every part of Porto and surroundings. The Avenida dos Aliados is 3 km away and the Clérigos Tower is a 8-minute drive away. The Douro River and the Ribeira area are 3.8 km away. Porto International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Impar Studios Deluxe
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Impar Studios Deluxe is located in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 100 metres from Sao Bento Train Station, 700 metres from Ribeira Square and 700 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. The property is around 2.7 km from Campanha Train Station, 3.4 km from Boavista Roundabout and 700 metres from D. Luis I Bridge. The property is 70 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The units in the apartment complex are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms have a balcony. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Impar Studios Deluxe.

name: RS Porto Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Featuring city views, RS Porto Apartments is situated in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 2.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 2.4 km from Music House. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.2 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the apartment.

Boavista Roundabout is 2.5 km from RS Porto Apartments, while Oporto Coliseum is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Boavista Class Inn
description:
Located in a restored 2-storey house, Boavista Class Inn offers contemporary and sober accommodation in Porto. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and the indoor courtyard.

Rooms have a flat-screen TV, free WiFi and views of the interior courtyard or to Casa da Música. Every room has a private bathroom.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Music House is 50 metres from Boavista Class Inn, while Casa da Musica Metro Station is 100 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking
description:
Located in Porto, 1.3 km from Music House, BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room comes with a kettle, while certain rooms include a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a toaster. At BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking each room includes bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast.

BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.

Boavista Roundabout is 1.3 km from the hotel, while Clerigos Tower is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking.

name: Casas do Rivoli
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, Casas do Rivoli is a sustainable accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. There is parking on-site and the property provides an electric vehicle charging station.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a bidet and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Casas do Rivoli, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Exe Almada Porto
description:
Well situated in the centre of Porto, Exe Almada Porto offers air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features a concierge service, and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units feature a safety deposit box.

Popular points of interest near Exe Almada Porto include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Republica Hostel & Suites
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Conveniently located in central Porto, this hostel has free WiFi throughout. Featuring rooms and dormitories, the unit is just 650 metres from the famed Aliados Avenue.

The Porto Republica is set in a renovated historic building, with wooden floors and an elegant and clean décor. All dormitories come with access to shared bathroom facilities. Some of the private rooms have their own bathroom, while others access shared bathroom facilities. Some rooms include a flat-screen cable TV. A daily cleaning service is provided

This hostel’s guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the communal kitchen at their disposal. There’s also a bar, where guests can get a drink to enjoy in the on-site lounge area. A wide range of eateries and restaurants are accessible within a short 5-minute walk, many of them serving the local Francesinha delicacy.

Guests of the Porto Republica Hostel & Suites have a 24-hour front desk at their disposal, which can provide assistance in various matters, like renting bicycles, arranging an airport shuttle or even getting advice on the city’s top spots.

Trindade Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and connects with most of the greater Porto area. At just a 10-minute walk are the Clérigos Tower and the lively Galerias de Paris nightlife quarter. The famous Lello Bookshop is also within a 10-minute walk. The nearest airport is Porto International Airport, 14.6 km from Porto Republica Hostel & Suites and also accessible via metro.

name: Three Houses & Bedrooms
description:
Located at 700 metres from the renowned Casa da Música and its metro station, Three Houses & Bedrooms is located in Boavista. These apartments and bedrooms are modernly decorated and are inserted in typical 19th century Porto buildings.

All the air-conditioned apartments come with a comfortable living area, complete with a flat-screen TV. The apartments also have a private bathroom, free WiFi and a kitchenette, along with a dining area. Some units also feature a sunny terrace with a lounge area. The unit also has private bedrooms, all with an en suite bathroom.

Guests of the apartments are welcome to cook their own meals in the fully equipped kitchenette at their disposal. Several local restaurants are available within a 10-minute walk and in the Porto centre, at a 6-minute drive from the apartments.

The iconic Clérigos Tower and the Dom Luís I Bridge are both under a 7-minute drive away. Galerias de Paris, the city’s main bar area is a 7-minute drive from the property. The Three Houses & Bedrooms is a 14-minute drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport.

name: Alma da Casa by DA'HOME
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 65m²
description:
Alma da Casa by DA'HOME provides accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. The apartment features family rooms.

All units are equipped with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms come with a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast, comprising juice and cheese is served daily at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Oporto Coliseum, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Alma da Casa by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa do Cristelo
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 66m²
description:
Set in Porto, 1.5 km from Clerigos Tower and 1.4 km from Palacio da Bolsa, Casa do Cristelo offers accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property is around 1.9 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 1.9 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 3 km from Oporto Coliseum. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Ferreira Borges Market.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers quiet street views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ribeira Square, Music House and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Casa do Cristelo.

name: Citybreak-apartments Bolhao
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Porto’s Santa Catarina Street, the city’s main commercial avenue, the apartments are 500 metres from the emblematic Café Majestic. The Bolhão Metro Station and the Market are a 3-minute walk from the Citybreak-apartments Bolhao.

All apartments have a living room with a sofa and flat-screen cable TV, free WiFi and bathroom with a hairdryer. The units come with an equipped kitchen and a balcony with a view.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the equipped kitchen at their disposal. The Aliados Avenue in central Porto is 700 metres away and features a wide range of restaurants, bars and shops. Galerias de Paris, Porto’s main bar area, are at a 15-minute walking distance.

The iconic Clérigos Tower is a 15-minute walk from the units. The historical São Bento Train Station is 1 km away. Dom Luis I Bridge connects with Vila Nova de Gaia and is a 9-minute drive. Porto International Airport is a 15-minute drive from Citybreak-apartments Bolhao.

name: Pinho Apartments, Studios and Rooms
description:
Pinho Apartments, Studios and Rooms in Porto provides accommodation with free WiFi, 1 km from Palacio da Bolsa, less than 1 km from Ferreira Borges Market and a 12-minute walk from Ribeira Square. The property is located 2.5 km from Music House, 1.9 km from Boavista Roundabout and 1.3 km from D. Luis I Bridge. The property is 300 metres from Clerigos Tower, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

All units in the guest house are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the guest house have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a seating area. At the guest house, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Pinho Apartments, Studios and Rooms.

name: Bright Quiet Flats - Prime Location
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Bright Quiet Flats - Prime Location features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Porto, 1.7 km from Sao Bento Train Station, 1.8 km from Oporto Coliseum and 2.6 km from Music House. The property is set 2.8 km from Boavista Roundabout, 1.9 km from Clerigos Tower and 3.3 km from Palacio da Bolsa. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.8 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, all units are soundproof. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Ferreira Borges Market is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Estadio do Dragao is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from Bright Quiet Flats - Prime Location, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa da Figueiroa
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 33m²
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Casa da Figueiroa is situated in Porto, 1.1 km from Boavista Roundabout and 1.7 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. Boasting private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Music House is 1.3 km away.

Fitted with a patio, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a kettle. At the guest house, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Casa da Figueiroa.

name: The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel
description:
Located in the heart of Porto, 100 metres from the Santa Catarina Street, The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel  is a 5-star hotel with a confortable and contemporary ambience. It offers free WiFi in all areas.

The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel features 17 spacious and modern air-conditioned rooms equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, safety deposit box and a minibar. Each room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer.

Functioning as a school-hotel for the students of the Porto School of Tourist, The Artist includes a restaurant with a varied menu, a bar and room service.

With 24-hour front desk, The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel offers facilities like a business centre, a meeting room and laundry service. Major attractions of the city are within walking distance including the Clérigos Tower, the Lello Bookstore and the Bolhão Market.

The 24 de Agosto Metro Station is 450 metres away and the São Bento Train Station is 1.2 km away. Porto International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Apartment Bolhao Market by Sweet Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Apartment Bolhao Market by Sweet Porto is a self-catering accommodation located in the centre of Porto just a few minutes’ walk from the Aliados Avenue and the Bolhão Market and metro station. Free WiFi access is available.

These studios include a double bedroom and a seating area equipped with a double sofa-bed and a flat-screen cable TV. The private bathroom has a shower.

Guests are welcome to prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchenette available. Alternatively guests can visit the various restaurants in the vicinity and taste traditional Porto delicacies and gastronomy.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Oporto Coliseum 400 metres away and the iconic Clérigos Tower a 10-minute walk away. Porto International Airport is located 16 km away.

name: BessaHotel Boavista
description:
Centrally located in Porto’s prestigious Boavista district, a few minutes’ from Casa da Musica, BessaHotel offers a fitness centre and a Turkish bath. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned luxurious rooms of BessaHotel are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have a work desk and a satellite/cable flat screen TV with Chromecast connectivity and video on demand. Some rooms have large terrace-style balconies with views of the city.

Featuring a 24-hour reception, BessaHotel provides a business centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities.

BessaHotel is 200 metres from Bessa Stadium and 1.6 km from Serralves Contemporary Art Museum. The Francos Metro Station is 1 km away and Porto International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Mouzinho Village River
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 180m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, Mouzinho Village River is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has private entrance.

At the apartment complex, units come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 17 km from Mouzinho Village River, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Indulge Porto Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Indulge Porto Flats is a sustainable apartment in the centre of Porto, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment provides city views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. Some units include a balcony and/or a patio with garden views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

Popular points of interest near Indulge Porto Flats include Oporto Coliseum, Music House and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Dom Henrique - Downtown
description:
Located in Porto's city centre, this recently renovated hotel offers a bar with panoramic views and  17º Restaurant & Bar serving traditional Portuguese cuisine. Trindade Metro Station is 200 metres from the hotel and connects with Porto International Airport.

Air-conditioned rooms at Dom Henrique Hotel are decorated with warm colours and contemporary  furniture. All rooms have a minibar, TV, and an en modern private bathroom.

The Cosmopolitan 17º Bar features a deck with scenic city views and provides a resident DJ and guests on Fridays, Saturdays and holiday eves. Restaurant Além-Mar features a tiled wall created by Júlio Resende, a famous contemporary Portuguese artist.

Hotel Dom Henrique has a 24-hour front desk and can organize citywide excursions and car rentals for guests. It also offers free high-speed WiFi access in all areas.

Dom Henrique is in the centre of the entertainment district, with Clérigos Tower less than 5 minutes’ walk away and Aliados Avenue a 3-minute walk. It is 600 metres away from Rua Santa Catarina and Via Catarina shopping venues. Porto International Airport is 16 km away from the Hotel Dom Henrique.

name: The A5 Smart Luxury Studios
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Well set in Porto, The A5 Smart Luxury Studios provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near The A5 Smart Luxury Studios include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casas da Corujeira

The holiday home provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A patio with an outdoor dining area and inner courtyard views is offered in every unit. At the holiday home, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Campanha Train Station is 1.8 km from the holiday home, while Estadio do Dragao is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Casas da Corujeira.

name: Eurostars Oporto
description:
Eurostars Oporto is a modern design hotel located 100 metres from Hospital São João Metro. The hotel offers a breakfast daily, contemporary rooms and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

All guest rooms at Eurostars Oporto have hardwood floors and flatscreen TVs. Each has a private balcony and a tiled en suite bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a glass of local Porto wine in the bar. Regional and international meals can be enjoyed in the privacy of the guest rooms. The 24-hour front desk can help with car and bicycle rental.

Matosinho Beach is only 8 km away, and Oporto’s Dragao Football Stadium just 3 km.

This Eurostars Hotel is conveniently located 10 minutes’ Metro journey from Porto’s historic centre. It is 10 minutes’ drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport.

name: Morar Apartments Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 56m²

Situated in the centre of Porto, just 200 metres from Clerigos Tower and 700 metres from Palacio da Bolsa, Morar Apartments Porto features accommodation with garden views and free WiFi. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 500 metres from Ferreira Borges Market. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

At the apartment complex, units have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property. Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Morar Apartments Porto.

description:

There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling and pub crawls are possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Popular points of interest near Suite na baixa do Porto include Music House, Boavista Roundabout and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
