description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 53m²
description:
Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a garden as well as a terrace, Saboaria is set in the centre of Porto, 800 metres from Oporto Coliseum. The property is close to Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. At Saboaria all rooms have bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options.

The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hot tub.

Popular points of interest near Saboaria include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: B. Arts
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
B. Arts features accommodation in studios and lofts located in Porto, just 1 km from central Aliados Avenue. The units are set in a renovated 19th century building and have city views, just 150 metres from the Porto Library, São Lázaro Garden and 500 metres from Coliseu do Porto.

Both studios and lofts feature an equipped kitchenette and a living area, with sofa and flat-screen cable TV. Each includes a private bathroom. The loft features a bed which is accessible through stairs. Free WiFi access is available.

Guests may prepare their own meals in the kitchenette of each self-catering accommodation. Alternatively, various restaurants are available within a short 5-minute walk. Among the local specialities are Francesinha and Tripas à Moda do Porto.

Campo 24 de Agosto Metro Station is 450 metres from the property and connects with most of the Porto area. The unit is a short walk from the Porto Arts Academy. Bicycle and car rental services are available. Historical São Bento Train Station is 700 metres away, while the Clérigos Tower and Galerias de Paris are 1.3 km away. B. Arts is 18 km from Porto International Airport.

name: Seventyset Flats - Porto Historical Center
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 20m²
description:
Seventyset Flats are located at a short walk from the Douro River in the historic city of Porto, a UNESCO World Heritage site. It is in a renovated building, which features historical elements along with modern touches.

All apartments are equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with toiletries, towels and bed linen. It has free WiFi.

Seventyset Flats provides a welcome basket with breakfast groceries and all the apartments have a complimentary bottle of wine and water. Meals can be prepared in the kitchenette and enjoyed in the dining area featured in all apartments. Alternatively, a variety of local restaurants nearby in Ribeira, Rua das Flores and Mouzinho da Silveira Street. Within a 10-minute walk is Galerias de Paris, known as one of the main nightlife spots of Porto.

The property is a 5-minute walk from Ribeira. Palácio da Bolsa is 260 metres away, while Ferreira Borges Market is at 350 metres. It is a 10-minute walk  from the Avenida dos Aliados and 950 metres from São Bento Station. The famous Centennial Lello Bookshop and The Clérigos Tower are both at a 13-minute walk. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 16.7 km from the property.

description:

With a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property features a year-round outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and terrace.

Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. At Pestana Douro Riverside each room comes with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

FC Porto Museum is 2.9 km from Pestana Douro Riverside, while Estadio do Dragao is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Popular points of interest near Axis Porto Club Aliados include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

The São José Hotel features a tour desk from where excursions can be arranged. These include the Porto City Tour, the Wine Cellar Tour and the Douro River Cruise. Guests can benefit from the hotel’s 24-hour front desk.

Drinks and refreshments are available from São José Hotel’s bar.

The open-plan apartments and studios are decorated with pastel colours and wooden parquet floors. There is a seating area with a flat-screen satellite TV and private bathroom facilities.

Guests can make use of their self-catering facilities with several shops, malls and supermarkets. The surrounding area offers a variety of national Portuguese and international cafés, restaurants and bars.

Aparthotel Oporto Entreparedes is situated 300 metres from the promenade on the Douro River with the iconic D. Luís Iron Bridge. The Coliseu do Porto theatre is also 300 metres away.

Local activities include windsurfing and cycling. Guests can also enjoy a boat trip along the Douro River. Francisco de Sá Carneiro International Airport is within a 20-minute drive away by car.

A wide range of popular restaurants, bars and cafés is available within a short walk. The property features an in-house restaurant as well. Speaking English and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Some studios combine a sober décor with hardwood floors and stone walls. Each studio features a living area with sofa, a flat-screen cable TV, a dining table and a Bluetooth column. The private bathroom includes a shower, toiletries and a hair dryer. Some studios have a balcony.

The open-plan kitchen invites guests to prepare their meals here. For a hassle-free stay, a number of restaurants can be found within walking distance. City Market Bolhao is 700 metres from Oporto Street Sá de Noronha.

The iconic São Bento Train Station is 800 metres away and Trindade Metro Station is 10 minutes' walking and connects directly with Porto International Airport, 11 km from Oporto Street Sá de Noronha.

Located 400 metres from City Market Bolhao and less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum, InSitu Trindade by Guestify in Porto provides air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A microwave, a fridge and oven are also provided, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at InSitu Trindade by Guestify.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from InSitu Trindade by Guestify, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apartment Alegria Street by Sweet Porto - Free Parking
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 53m²
description:
Situated 400 metres from Oporto Coliseum and less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station in the centre of Porto, Apartment Alegria Street by Sweet Porto - Free Parking features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is less than 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Campanha Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from Apartment Alegria Street by Sweet Porto - Free Parking, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Editory Garden Porto Hotel
description:
Well set in the centre of Porto, The Editory Garden Porto Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum.

All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At The Editory Garden Porto Hotel every room includes bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed.

Popular points of interest near The Editory Garden Porto Hotel include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Aparthotel Oporto Sol
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 2 living rooms • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Located within less than 1 km of Sao Bento Train Station and a 13-minute walk of Ribeira Square in Porto, Aparthotel Oporto Sol provides accommodation with seating area. It is situated 1.4 km from Palacio da Bolsa and features an ATM. The property is less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. All units come with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms have a terrace and some have city views. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Aparthotel Oporto Sol.

name: Abbey Apartments City Center
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
Situated in Porto city centre, Abbey Apartments City Center offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. The apartment is 200 metres from City Market Bolhao.

There is a dining area and a fully equipped kitchenette equipped with oven. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is provided.

Oporto Coliseum and Majestic Cafe are 400 metres from Abbey Apartments City Center. Paris Galleries Street and Clérigo Tower are 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 15 km from Abbey Apartments City Center.

name: Naya-Downtown Guesthouse
description:
Offering a shared lounge and city view, Naya-Downtown Guesthouse is located in Porto, 2 km from Music House and 1.8 km from Boavista Roundabout. It is set 2.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and provides private check-in and check-out. The guest house features family rooms.

Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony. The units at the guest house are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Sao Bento Train Station is 2.6 km from the guest house, while Oporto Coliseum is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from Naya-Downtown Guesthouse.

name: Tripas-Coração, Sá da Bandeira
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Situated within 200 metres of City Market Bolhao and 700 metres of Oporto Coliseum in Porto, Tripas-Coração, Sá da Bandeira offers accommodation with a kitchen. Complimentary WiFi is provided.

Fitted with a balcony, the units feature a TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine.

Lello Bookshop is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Paris Galleries Street is 1.7 km from the property. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 16 km away.

name: Maison Cabral
description:
Featuring a garden and views of garden, Maison Cabral is a sustainable guest house located in Porto, 1.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.6 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The guest house provides an outdoor swimming pool with a pool bar, as well as wellness packages and luggage storage space.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. All units come with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and some have pool views. At the guest house, all units have bed linen and towels.

A bar can be found on-site.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Maison Cabral include Oporto Coliseum, Music House and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Premium Porto Downtown
description:
Premium Porto Downtown is located in Porto's historical centre, 800 metres from Aliados Avenue. The modern and tranquil 4-star hotel has a sun terrace with scenic views, where guests can relax while enjoying a drink from the bar.

Every one of the 56 modern and elegant rooms at this hotel is air conditioned and fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar, safe, work desk and free WiFi access. All rooms come with a private bathroom which includes a hairdryer . Superior rooms also come with a bathtub and a coffee machine.

Room breakfast is available, at an extra fee. Alternatively, those wishing to try out the local gastronomy can visit one of the many Porto restaurants available within a short 5-minute walk.

The Porto Coliseum is 300 metres away from the hotel. The iconic Clérigos Tower is at a 10-minute walk, as are the lively bars and restaurants of Galerias de Paris. 650 metres away is São Bento Train Station. Dom Luis I Bridge is a 10-minute walk and connects with the site of the Port Wine Cellars. Premium Porto Downtown is 18 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport. A shuttle service from the airport is provided, upon previous request and at an extra fee.

name: Oporto Serviced Apartments - 1858
description:
Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Oporto Serviced Apartments bbgourmet is set in Porto, 800 metres from Paris Galleries Street. Clerigos Tower is 900 metres away. Private parking is available on site.

All units have a seating and dining area. A dishwasher and kettle are also featured. All units also have a kitchen or a kitchenette, fitted with an oven, a microwave, and a toaster. Bed linen is available.

Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, with packed lunches available on request.

City Market Bolhao is 1 km from Oporto Serviced Apartments bbgourmet, while Boavista Roundabout is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: Olival 54 Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Situated in the centre of Porto, just 400 metres from Palacio da Bolsa and 400 metres from Ferreira Borges Market, Olival 54 Apartments features accommodation with river views and free WiFi. The property has city views and is 500 metres from Clerigos Tower and 600 metres from Ribeira Square. This 5-star apartment offers private entrance.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Olival 54 Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Almada Story Apartments by Porto City Hosts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Offering city views, Almada Story Apartments by Porto City Hosts is an accommodation situated in Porto, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station and a 13-minute walk from Oporto Coliseum. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Almada Story Apartments by Porto City Hosts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Top Flat
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 62m²
description:
Set in Miragaia, one of Porto’s historical neighbourhoods, this property overlooks the Douro River and is a 2-minute walk from the Alfândega do Porto. It is a 3-minute drive from the Vila Nova de Gaia riverside area.

All the air-conditioned studios and apartments feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV, sofas and views over the city and the Douro River. Some have an equipped kitchenette.

Guests can prepare their own meals comfortably in the self-catering apartments and studios. Alternatively, the Ribeira area, overlooking the Douro River, is a 5-minute walk and features a variety of local restaurants serving typical Portuguese meals and tapas.

Galerias Paris, Porto’s main nightlife hotspot is a 9-minute walk away. This area overlooks the iconic Clérigos Tower and is a few steps from the historical Lello Bookstore. The TOP FLAT is a 7-minute drive from the Aliados in the Porto city centre. The Porto Wine Cellars are set on the Gaia riverside and there guests can taste quality Port wines and stroll along the scenic boardwalk area. The famed São Bento Train Station has historically-themed tiled panels and is a 5-minute walk away.

The Porto International Airport is a 17-minute drive from the TOP FLAT. An airport shuttle is available, at a surcharge.

Please note that a free mid-stay cleaning including change of bath towels will only be applied for stays over 3 nights.
Stays of 7 nights or more will also profit from linen change.

name: Luxury Oasis in Bonfim by LovelyStay
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 44m²
description:
Offering garden views, Luxury Oasis in Bonfim by LovelyStay is an accommodation set in Porto, less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 2.1 km from FC Porto Museum. The property is around 3.3 km from Estadio do Dragao, 3.4 km from Ribeira Square and 2 km from Ferreira Borges Market. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Campanha Train Station is 1.3 km away.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Luxury Oasis in Bonfim by LovelyStay.

name: Casa Kala
description:
Situated in the centre of Porto, Casa Kala is a recently renovated accommodation, which features allergy-free rooms. This sustainable guest house is located 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests can have wine or champagne and fruits delivered to their room. At the guest house, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available each morning at the guest house.

Casa Kala has a sun terrace and a picnic area.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Casa Kala.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
situated in Porto's historic centre, Rua de Trás Apartments is 130 metres from the Clérigos Church.

 All rooms include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine. one of the rooms feature a balcony with a view.

Popular points of interest near Rua de Trás Apartments are Paris Galleries Street, Lello Bookshop is 230 metres away. The historic São Bento Train Station is at 500 metres. Porto's Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 15 km from the property and is reachable by metro.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from São Domingos Flowers Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

At the apartment complex, the units come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. description:

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surrounding area.

Campanha Train Station is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Oporto Coliseum is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Blissful Suites Porto.

name: The Art Porto - Holiday Homes
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Set within 200 metres of Oporto Coliseum and 700 metres of Sao Bento Metro Station in the centre of Porto, The Art Porto - Holiday Homes offers accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. The air-conditioned accommodation is 600 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

The units in the apartment complex are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The units are fitted with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms here will provide you with a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a dishwasher. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from The Art Porto - Holiday Homes.

name: Porto Downtown Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Porto Downtown Flats is set in different locations in Porto's historic Ribeira, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Ferreira Borges Market and the Stock Exchange Palace are both within a 5-minute walk from the property.

The units are situated in traditional Porto buildings. Each apartment's living area is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a dining area and/or balcony. All units have a full kitchenette. There is a private bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer in each apartment. All feature free WiFi.

Various restaurants are available at a short walk, many of them serving traditional Portuguese cuisine, tapas and even regional specialities like the famed Francesinha.

The Lello Bookshop and the trendy Galerias de Paris are within a 15-minute walk. São Bento Train Station is a 10-minute walk from the apartments. The nearest airport is Porto International Airport, accessible via a 45-minute metro ride.

name: The Gate
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, The Gate is a sustainable accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. It is set 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and features a lift. The guest house provides a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Some units include a balcony and/or a patio with city views. At the guest house, all units have bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from The Gate, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: YOUROPO - Market
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 44m²
description:
YOUROPO - Market provides accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

All units are equipped with a fridge, stovetop, a coffee machine, a kitchenware and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area. A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near YOUROPO - Market include Oporto Coliseum, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apartment Boavista Roundabout by Sweet Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 35m²
description:
Located in Porto, Apartment Boavista Roundabout by Sweet Porto features accommodation with a flat-screen TV. Complimentary WiFi is provided.

All units are equipped with an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, a fridge and kettle. There is also a kitchen equipped with a stovetop.

Music House is 300 metres from the apartment, while Boavista Roundabout is 10 metres from the property. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 13 km away.

name: Pestana Apartments - Premium
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Situated 1.4 km from FC Porto Museum, Pestana Apartments - Premium offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a car rental service.

Popular points of interest near Pestana Apartments - Premium include Campanha Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Estadio do Dragao. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mercado dos Poetas – Tourism Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 37m²
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, 600 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 700 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, Mercado dos Poetas – Tourism Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. name: Almada 234
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, Almada 234 is a sustainable accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

At the apartment complex, units are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Almada 234, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Old Town – Tourism Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 32m²
description:
Porto Old Town is made of modern refurbished apartments and studios in a central location of Porto. A 2-minute walk from Trindade and Bolhão Metro Stations, the property is surrounded by restaurants and iconic landmarks.

The apartments include a separate living room with a sofa, while studios have an open-plan layout with a bedroom and dining area. Free WiFi is included.

Each accommodation includes a kitchenette with a small refrigerator, a microwave and a stovetop. The bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer.

Santa Catarina shopping street is around 300 metres, with Majestic Café, Almas Chapel and Via Catarina Shopping Centre. Porto Cathedral is within a 10-minute walk.

Porto International Airport is around 15 km from Porto Old Town apartments and is accessible through the nearby Trindade Metro Station.

name: Mouzinho 160
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 80m²
description:
Mouzinho 160 is a recently renovated building from the 19th century with a view over the old city rooftops including Porto’s iconic Clerigos Tower. Free WiFi is available on site.

All the units include a seating area with a flat-screen TV and some of them are air conditioned. There is also a kitchenette equipped with a microwave and a hotplate. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in every unit.

The city's main night-life spots are just a 5-minute walk away from the apartments. On the ground-floor of the building there is a trendy restaurant from a 2-Michelin Star awarded Chef.

In the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage, Mouzinho 160 is 300 metres from the Douro River and 100 metres from S. Bento Train and Metro stations. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 11 km away.

name: Gonzaga Flats - 1T w/View by LovelyStay
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Situated in Porto, near Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Metro Station, Gonzaga Flats - 1T w/View by LovelyStay features free WiFi. The property is around 3.5 km from Music House, 3.7 km from Boavista Roundabout and less than 1 km from D. Luis I Bridge. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 3-minute walk from Palacio da Bolsa.

Offering 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, this apartment features a flat-screen TV. The accommodation is non-smoking.

For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook in your kitchenette.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Gonzaga Flats - 1T w/View by LovelyStay.

name: Oporto Bonjardim Residence
description:
Oporto Bonjardim Residence is set in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station, 1.1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 1.3 km from Clerigos Tower. It is situated 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Each unit has a private bathroom, while some rooms have a balcony and others also boast a city view. At the guest house, some units are fitted with a kettle and wine or champagne.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Oporto Bonjardim Residence.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:
Ando Living - Santa Catarina Townhouse offers accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The air-conditioned accommodation is 200 metres from Oporto Coliseum. The property is close to popular attractions like Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market.

At the apartment complex, the units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units at the apartment complex come with a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Campanha Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from Ando Living - Santa Catarina Townhouse.

name: Mercure Porto Centro Santa Catarina
description:
Located in the heart of Porto, the Mercure Porto Centro Santa Catarina offers you an ideal location for visiting the historic center of the city.

The completely renovated hotel welcomes you in a modern and warm atmosphere. While enjoying the view of the city from the hotel's 'La Bicicleta' restaurant, you can sample regional Portuguese cuisine. You can also have a drink or snack in the cozy setting of the hotel bar or on our rooftop.

For your comfort, the modern rooms of the hotel with a view of Porto are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar.
The bathroom also has a relaxing bathtub and a hairdryer.

For your business trips, the hotel has a free Wi-Fi connection and 4 meeting rooms equipped for your professional events and seminars.

The Mercure Porto Centro is suitable both for families thanks to its spacious suites and attention for children, but also for couples and business travelers who can enjoy the calm and the ideal location for the hotel to visit the city.

Ideally located, the Mercure Porto Centro Santa Catarina is near the São Bento train station, which is only a 7-minute walk away, but also many tourist attractions: Casa da Música, Torre dos Clérigos, and the famous Café Majestic.

The famous Torre dos Clérigos bell tower and the romantic Ribeira district with its many cafés can be reached in less than 10 minutes on foot.

name: Lemago Porto Apartments - Poveiros
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Offering free WiFi and garden views, Lemago Porto Apartments - Poveiros is an accommodation set in the heart of Porto, just 200 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 800 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. This sustainable apartment is located 700 metres from Sao Bento Train Station and 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

At the apartment complex, the units come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near Lemago Porto Apartments - Poveiros include Campanha Train Station, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Authentic Porto Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Located in the historic Porto centre, Authentic Porto Apartments is just a few steps from the Bolsa Palace and a 5-minute walk from the scenic riverfront Ribeira area. Ferreira Borges Market is 100 metres away, as is the São Francisco Church.

The apartments' building dates back to the 1950's and has been fully renovated, while still maintaining most of its charm and traditional features. All ample units include a window view over the streets of Porto and have plenty of natural light. Each apartment has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, a kitchen and a private bathroom, with a hair dryer.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the full kitchen at their disposal. Alternatively, various typical restaurants and eateries are available nearby, many within a short 5-minute walk in Ribeira, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

The Clérigos Tower is a 10-minute walk away, while Galerias de Paris, with its many lively bars, are at a 15-minute walk. Aliados Avenue and the São Bento Train Station are within a 10-minute walk. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Adorable Apartments in Great Area
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Adorable Apartments in Great Area offers accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. It is set 200 metres from Palacio da Bolsa and provides luggage storage space. The apartment features family rooms.

The units come with a fridge, stovetop, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. The units are fitted with a private bathroom and kettle, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Adorable Apartments in Great Area, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Oporto Trendy Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Oporto Trendy Apartments features accommodation in central Porto. The bright units feature modern furnishings and are sited 700 metres from the main Aliados Avenue.

All apartments and studios come with a living area, featuring sofas, a flat-screen cable TV and a DVD player. There is an equipped kitchenette and all feature a private bathroom with quality toiletries.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the equipped kitchenettes, enjoying them in the bright dining areas. The nearby Porto centre has various traditional restaurants within a 5-minute walk. The area is renowned for its wines and for dishes such as the traditional Francesinha.

Private parking is available, upon request and at an extra cost. Bicycle rental is possible with the front desk, for those wishing to tour the city in an alternate fashion.

The renowned Clérigos Tower is 1.3 km away, as are the popular and lively Galerias de Paris, with its many bars and cafés. The historical São Bento Train Station is 1.1 km away from the apartments. The nearest Metro Station is within 500 metres and the Trendy Apartments are 19 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport.

name: Apartamentos The Arc Carrís
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Situated within the historic Porto centre, Apartamentos The Arc Carrís is a mere 2-minute walk from Ribeira, a UNESCO World Heritage site. The luxurious apartments are set in a renovated historic building, just 700 metres from Aliados Avenue and a 5-minute walk from São Bento Train Station.

All apartments feature an elegant décor, while still maintaining some of the classic features of the original structure. Each offers free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. Every unit has a private bathroom, air conditioning and a full kitchen, which comes equipped with a dishwasher and a coffee machine. Some units also feature a balcony and/or panoramic views.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the kitchen of their apartment or to go out and discover the famed Porto cuisine, in of the many restaurants within a 5-minute walk.

The traditional Rua das Flores is a renovated pedestrian street, which is a 5-minute walk and includes many shops, cafés and eateries. The iconic D. Luis I Bridge is a 6-minute walk from the apartment. The Bolsa Palace is at 270 metres. The nearest airport is Porto International Airport, 14 km from Apartamentos The Arc Carrís.

name: GuestReady - São Brás Mezzanine
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located in Porto, 1.9 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.9 km from Sao Bento Train Station, GuestReady - São Brás Mezzanine provides air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The property is situated 2.5 km from Music House, 2.7 km from Clerigos Tower and 2.7 km from Boavista Roundabout. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.4 km from Oporto Coliseum.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

FC Porto Museum is 2.9 km from GuestReady - São Brás Mezzanine, while Palacio da Bolsa is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Formosa Oporto Apartments Group
description:
Located in a rebuilt building with the original facade preserved, OPorto Apartments Group Formosa offers self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi. It features a bicycle rental service.

OPorto Apartments has modern studios and apartments, decorated in bright colours. Each of the spacious units has a flat-screen satellite TV, a sofa bed, and ironing facilities.

Mercado do Bolhão is just a 1-minute walk away, while Praça da Liberdade is 600 metres. The metro stations of Bolhão and Aliados are also within walking distance.

name: Mouzinho da Silveira Unique Apartments, by Oporto Collection
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Mouzinho da Silveira Unique Apartments, by Oporto Collection offers accommodation within 500 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a toaster, a fridge and a stovetop. The property has city views and is 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 400 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. The accommodation features a lift, full-day security and luggage storage for guests.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ribeira Square, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 17 km from Mouzinho da Silveira Unique Apartments, by Oporto Collection, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: GuestReady - House of Mompilher -A
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
GuestReady - House of Mompilher -A offers accommodation within 500 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is set 800 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and provides a lift. Music House is 2.5 km from the apartment and Boavista Roundabout is 1.8 km away.

The units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. Some accommodation includes a terrace and a satellite TV equipped with cable channels, as well as air conditioning. All units feature a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from GuestReady - House of Mompilher -A.

name: Flattered to be in Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Flattered to be in Porto offers self-contained apartments within an attractive historical building, facing Foz do Douro. All apartments feature a modern interior design and the convenience of hotel services.

Offering all the comforts of a home away from home, these apartments are equipped with an iPod docking station, a satellite flat-screen TV, and a CD/DVD player. Some rooms offer city views and others overlook the sea.

In addition to a fully equipped kitchenette with all the necessary utensils to prepare meals, room service is also available. Alternatively, a variety of restaurants can be found within 200 metres.

After a stroll on Luz beach, guests can enjoy the exclusive relaxing services offered at Flattered, such as massages and concierge services.

Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 13.6 km away, and Sea Life Porto is 2.6 km. Porto’s old town, classified as a UNESCO Heritage Site, is 5 km away.

name: GuestReady - Modern Elegance in Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 44m²
description:
GuestReady - Modern Elegance in Porto is located in the Bonfim district of Porto, 1.4 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 1.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 2.2 km from Campanha Train Station. The property is around 1.7 km from Clerigos Tower, 3.2 km from Palacio da Bolsa and 3.2 km from Ferreira Borges Market. The property is 1 km from Oporto Coliseum, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom with a hair dryer, a seating area, and a living room. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is provided. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Estadio do Dragao is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Ribeira Square is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from GuestReady - Modern Elegance in Porto.

name: Calacatta Housing
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
A sustainable property, Calacatta Housing is set in Porto near Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station.

Featuring a well-fitted kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. The units include a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and some have city views. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Calacatta Housing, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Seculo Hotel
description:
Situated on the famous Rua de Santa Catarina, Século Hotel is conveniently located for shopping, public transport and the UNESCO centre of Porto. There is free Wi-Fi in public areas.

All the air-conditioned rooms at the Século Hotel feature a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. Each unit has a private bathroom and a minibar.

The hotel also has its own bar and a rooftop sun terrace where guests can relax. A small fitness centre is also available for the sport lovers.

Século Hotel is located on one of Portugal's most popular shopping streets. Many museums are also just a short walk away, including the Natural History Museum and the Photography Museum.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the train station and a 5-minute walk from the Metro station. Porto Airport is 15 km away. A free on-site park is also available.

name: TURIM Oporto Hotel
description:
Well situated in Porto, TURIM Oporto Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a shared lounge, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

TURIM Oporto Hotel offers a sun terrace. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from TURIM Oporto Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pousada do Porto - Rua das Flores
description:
Well located in the centre of Porto, Pousada do Porto - Rua das Flores provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Situated conveniently in the União de Freguesias do Centro district, this hotel offers a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation features room service and a concierge service for guests.

At the hotel, each room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at Pousada do Porto - Rua das Flores.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Pousada do Porto - Rua das Flores.

name: Eurostars das Artes
description:
Partly housed in a modern building and partly in a historical palace with a tiled façade, Das Artes is centrally located in Porto. It offers design-conscious accommodation with rotating art exhibitions.

The guest rooms of the Hotel Das Artes are carefully furnished and feature hardwood floors. They all include free internet, air conditioning and a cable TV.

A popular breakfast prepared using seasonal ingredients is served daily at the restaurant. Guests can enjoy a glass of classic port wine in the hotel’s bar or relax in the garden area.

A concierge service is available and can arrange car and bicycle rental.

Hotel Das Artes hotel is a 5-minute walk from most local cultural institutions, including the Jardins do Palacio de Cristal and the Museu Nacional De Soares Dos Reis. Ponte Dom Luis Bridge is a 7-minute drive away.

name: Alegria Studio
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set in Porto, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 11-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station, Alegria Studio provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a TV. Popular points of interest nearby include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and D. Luis I Bridge. The property is 400 metres from Oporto Coliseum, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Campanha Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from Alegria Studio.

name: Jardins do Porto - by Unlock Hotels
description:
A sustainable bed and breakfast in Porto and within less than 1 km of Sao Bento Metro Station, Jardins do Porto - by Unlock Hotels has a garden, comfortable allergy-free rooms and free WiFi. It is situated 1.1 km from Oporto Coliseum and features a lift. The property is less than 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

The bed and breakfast will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Some units have a terrace and/or a patio with garden views and an outdoor dining area. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and vegetarian breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits are available each morning at the bed and breakfast. Guests are welcome to eat in the on-site family-friendly restaurant, which is open for dinner, cocktails and high tea. Dining options are available close to Jardins do Porto - by Unlock Hotels.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Jardins do Porto - by Unlock Hotels, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hospes Infante Sagres Porto
description_short: Private suite
description:
This historic 5-star hotel, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, is located in central Porto, a 4-minute walk from Aliados Metro Station. Renovated in early 2018, the hotel has antique chandeliers in its public areas and also features the newly-opened Scarlett Brasserie & Wine Bar.

The soundproofed rooms and suites of the Hotel Infante De Sagres feature custom-made furnishings. The classical décor comes together with satellite flat-screen TVs and air conditioning.

A wide range of popular restaurants and eateries is available within a short walk from the property. Just 200 metres away are Galerias de Paris, a hip area which has a range of popular bars, shops and restaurants.

The historic property also features a sundeck, with a plunge pool and sun loungers.

Situated in Porto’s UNESCO Heritage city centre, Infante De Sagres is a 10-minute walk from the Cathedral and a 10-minute drive from Rem Koolhaas's Casa da Mùsica Concert Hall. At a 14-minute walk is the top of the iconic Dom Luís I Bridge, which provides scenic views over the Douro River and the city. A shuttle can be arranged for Francisco de Sá Carneiro Airport, which is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu
description:
Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu offers classy accommodation, with modern touches, in the heart of Porto. The property is a 5-minute walk from the Porto city centre and a 3-minute drive away from the iconic D. Luís I Bridge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu feature a private bathroom with free toiletries, flat-screen cable or satellite TV, free WiFi access and a safe.

A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the guest house. It is a 5-minute walk to the Aliados in the Porto city centre, with many bars, restaurants, cafés and shops. The local specialties include the Francesinha: a typical dish made up of meats, bread, cheese and a rich sauce.

The house has a cosy patio area, where guests guests are welcome to relax and take a break.

Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu is an 8-minute walk from Batalha and Santa Catarina Street, Porto’s main commercial avenue. It is a 4-minute walk to the São Bento train station and its distinctive tiled panels with historical themes. Clérigos Tower is a 4-minute walk and the the Galerias Paris nightlife hotspot is a 5-minute walk away, with its many bars, cafés and lively atmosphere.

The Porto International Airport is a 20-minute drive away and the Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu has a shuttle service available, at a surcharge.

name: GuestReady - Wavebreak Balcony
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
GuestReady - Wavebreak Balcony has a balcony and is situated in Porto, within just 1.7 km of FC Porto Museum and 1.7 km of Campanha Train Station. The property is around 1.7 km from Estadio do Dragao, 2.9 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 3 km from Sao Bento Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Oporto Coliseum is 2 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Clerigos Tower is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Ribeira Square is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from GuestReady - Wavebreak Balcony.

name: Pestana Cozy House
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Pestana Cozy House is set in the Bonfim district of Porto, 1.5 km from Campanha Train Station, 1.5 km from Oporto Coliseum and 1.8 km from Estadio do Dragao. The property is around 3.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 3.7 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 3.7 km from Clerigos Tower. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and FC Porto Museum is 1.4 km away.

The apartment is fitted with a flat-screen TV. The air-conditioned accommodation is equipped with a kitchen. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Ribeira Square is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Ferreira Borges Market is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Pestana Cozy House.

name: Se Catedral Hotel Porto, Tapestry Collection By Hilton
description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Porto, Se Catedral Hotel Porto, Tapestry Collection By Hilton features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Popular points of interest near Se Catedral Hotel Porto, Tapestry Collection By Hilton include Sao Bento Train Station, Ribeira Square and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Mira D'Aire
description:
Centrally located in Porto, this charming hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a rich breakfast prepared with local ingredients. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

The rooms at Hotel Mira D'Aire are decorated with dark wooden furnishings and are fully air conditioned. They include a tea/coffee maker, a work desk and a private bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the hotel. The friendly staff at Mira D'Aire can offer advice on local activities. After a day of exploring the area, guests can enjoy a refreshing drink at the bar.

Bicycle rental and laundry services are among the convenient facilities offered by the Hotel Mira. Lapa Metro Station is located just a few minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Oca Flores Hotel Boutique
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Situated in the heart of Porto, Oca Flores Hotel Boutique is set on an 18th century historical building and offers a complete wellness centre. This property provides free WiFi.

Flores Boutique includes a variety of apartments and rooms spread through various buildings. Each accommodation is equipped with air conditioning, soundproofing, telephone, flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. The private bathrooms are complete with a bidet, a hairdryer, a bath and free toiletries.

The apartments are spacious and include a fully equipped kitchenette that guests can use to prepare their own meals. In addition, the property provides a room service and breakfast in the room. A bar is also available where guests can socialize and relax after spending a day exploring the city.

Guests can easily visit some of the most iconic landmarks of the city including the Clérigos Tower and the Lello Bookstore, both just a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The World Heritage Ribeira area with its restaurants, bars and cafés is 550 metres away and the São bento Train Station is a mere 220 metres away. Porto International Airport is 16 km away.

name: Ribeira Historic Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Located within 300 metres of Ribeira Square and 300 metres of Palacio da Bolsa in the centre of Porto, Ribeira Historic Apartments provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 100 metres from Ferreira Borges Market. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Ribeira Historic Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Editory Boulevard Aliados Hotel - Preferred Hotels
description:
Ideally located in Porto, The Editory Boulevard Aliados Hotel - Preferred Hotels offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean and Portuguese dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.

At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The Editory Boulevard Aliados Hotel - Preferred Hotels provides some units with city views, and each room has a coffee machine. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The Editory Boulevard Aliados Hotel - Preferred Hotels offers a sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from The Editory Boulevard Aliados Hotel - Preferred Hotels, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Panorama Apartments Ribeira Porto
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 15m²
description:
Panorama Apartments Ribeira Porto is a house comprising 4 fully equipped holiday studio apartments situated in Ribeira, on the water front of the Douro River, and in the heart of Porto's Historic Centre.

All the apartments and the room have views over the river Douro, the world famous Don Luis Bridge and the Port Wine cellars across the river in Gaia.

Both D. Luis Bridge and Douro River are a 1-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 12 km away.

name: InSitu Formosa 178 by Guestify
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 42m²
description:
Situated in Porto, 300 metres from Oporto Coliseum and less than 1 km from City Market Bolhao, InSitu Formosa 178 by Guestify features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and access to a garden with a terrace.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at InSitu Formosa 178 by Guestify.

Ferreira Borges Market is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Clerigos Tower is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from InSitu Formosa 178 by Guestify, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS
description:
Attractively situated in the centre of Porto, GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS features air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Feel Porto Firmeza Coworking & Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 41m²
description:
Feel Porto Firmeza Coworking & Flats features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Porto, 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 1.1 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 1.4 km from Clerigos Tower. This sustainable apartment is located 1.9 km from Palacio da Bolsa and 1.7 km from Ferreira Borges Market. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. Every unit includes a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a terrace and some have city views. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fruits and juice is served for the continental breakfast.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

Campanha Train Station is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Ribeira Square is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Feel Porto Firmeza Coworking & Flats, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near BREINER 28 include Ferreira Borges Market, Boavista Roundabout and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

The spacious rooms at the Porto Trindade Hotel are decorated with warm touches. All have a seating area and are equipped with a flat-screen TV, satellite TV and a tea/coffee maker. The large bathroom comes with free shampoo and soap products.

The guests of the Porto Trindade Hotel can enjoy the big lounge bar area. A buffet breakfast is served in a Mediterranean themed breakfast lounge every morning. An in-room breakfast is also available.

The Via Catarina Shopping Centre is less than a 10-minute walk away. The historic São Bento Train Station is 1.5 km away from the hotel.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Traça Apartments by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while certain rooms include a balcony. At the guest house, every unit has bed linen and towels.

The guest house has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include FC Porto Museum, Clerigos Tower and D. Luis I Bridge. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Monte Carlo Love Porto.

description:

Large windows ensure an airy feel in all S.Marino’s rooms. Each is equipped with a private bathroom and a work desk. Some feature views of the square. WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.

Continental breakfast includes freshly baked bread rolls. Guests at Hotel S.Marino can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or out in the small garden. There is also a common living room with a TV.

Tours and rental cars can be arranged with the help of S.Marino’s staff, available 24 hours a day. The hotel is located 1 km from the Ribeira and the famous port cellars.

name: Porto Vintage Guesthouse
description:
Porto Vintage Guesthouse is primely located in Porto’s centre. The charming unit has renovated rooms and is 350 metres from Trindade Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from Aliados Avenue.

Featuring free WiFi access, the comfortable rooms of this B&B have high ornamented ceilings and most feature a view of the city. These air-conditioned units have their own private bathroom, with a bath or shower and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available each morning for guests of the Porto Vintage, and can be enjoyed on the comfortable terrace. A wide range of Portuguese and international restaurants, cafés and pastry shops is on offer at a short 5-minute walk.

The renowned Clérigos Tower is 1.4 km from the property, as are the lively Galerias de Paris and its popular bars. Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 15 km from the Porto Vintage Guesthouse, and is accessible via Metro from Trindade station.

name: Suites Foz O Porto
description:
Suites Foz O Porto offers accommodation in Porto, at a 5-minute walk from the nearest beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site.

All rooms have a TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. Enjoy a cup of tea from your terrace or balcony. Extras include slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Superior rooms include a spa bath or a sauna.

You will find a shared kitchen at the property.

A number of activities are offered in the area, such as cycling and hiking. Oporto Sea Life is 1.9 km from Suites Foz O Porto , while Bessa Football Stadium is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 9 km from Suites Foz O Porto.

name: Pestana Palacio do Freixo, Pousada & National Monument - The Leading Hotels of the World
description:
Overlooking Douro River in Porto, the 5-star Palácio Do Freixo is set in a restored 18th-century Baroque building. It offers aristocratic public areas with stately architecture, combined with modern rooms with flat-screen TV.

Rooms at Pestana Palácio do Freixo are spacious, air-conditioned and have a separate seating area. Bathrooms include luxury amenities and a hairdryer. Some rooms offer Douro River views.

Guests can relax on a sun lounger next to the hotel's infinity pool which overlooks the river. The spa has a Turkish bath, heated indoor pool and a sauna. Massage treatments are also available.

The restaurant at Pestana Palácio do Freixo serves a daily buffet breakfast cooked with fresh ingredients. Guests can order light snacks at the pool or evening cocktails at the hotel’s bar.

The hotel is situated 1 km from Campanhã Train Station. Porto Airport is a 20-minute drive away and free parking is available.  Pestana Palácio do Freixo offers free transfer to the city centre.

name: GuestReady - Boutique style loft in Constituição
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 37m²
description:

The property is located 2.3 km from Boavista Roundabout, 2.7 km from Oporto Coliseum and 3 km from Clerigos Tower. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station.

The apartment features a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

FC Porto Museum is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Palacio da Bolsa is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from GuestReady - Boutique style loft in Constituição.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Situated in a renovated historic building overlooking the Douro River, Your Opo Apartments offer luxury accommodation with panoramic river views and free Wi-Fi. Some have balconies with river views.

Each apartment has a spacious lounge with flat-screen cable TV and double sofa bed. The kitchenette includes an oven, fridge and microwave, while the private bathrooms have free toiletries. Linen and towels are provided.

In the morning, guests can enjoy breakfast in the various cafes and terraces right along the river and at the Cubo Square. A supermarket is less than 5 minutes’ walk.

Douro River cruises depart from the area in front of the apartments and Porto Cathedral is a 10-minute walk away. Local buses pass 50 metres from the apartments, offering access to central Porto.

 Your Opo Apartments are 1 km from São Bento Metro Station and train station. Porto’s Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 21 km away and an airport shuttle is available on request.

The air-conditioned units feature a living room with a flat-screen TV, a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom with bathrobes and a hairdryer. There is a seating and a dining area in all units.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at D'Autor Apartments Alegria, 400 metres away from D'Autor Apartments Sa da Bandeira.

Popular points of interest near D'Autor Apartments Sá da Bandeira include Clerigos Tower, Ferreira Borges Market and Lello Bookshop. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

The famous Lello Bookshop and Paris Galleries Street are 650 metres from Almada Apartments 468. The iconic São Bento Station and its metro stop are 800 metres away. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 15 km from Almada Apartments 468.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Tiara Downtown Apartments by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description:
Santa Catarina FLH Suites features accommodation in Porto's historic centre, within the popular shopping street of Santa Catarina. The rooms and suites are at a traditional Porto building, which was fully refurbished and features modern comforts.

Some rooms at the B&B have a view, while others can also include a terrace. The whole property has a predominately clean décor, with some antique decorative pieces and details. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the property. The surrounding area is filled with popular cafés and restaurants, where guests will be able to taste traditional Portuguese and Porto delicacies.

Clerigos Tower is 700 metres from the accommodation, while the lively Galerias de Paris, a street renowned for its bars and nightlife, is a 6-minute walk away. At a 7-minute walk is the Guindais Funicular, which provides panoramic river views as its descends towards the Ribeira area, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Porto's Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 18 km from Santa Catarina FLH Suites.
