description:
Located in a fully-renovated historical building, the Porto AS 1829 Hotel is located in the city’s historical centre. Noted Porto landmarks like the Clérigos Tower and São Bento Train Station are a 7-minute walk.

The Hotel has ample rooms, all with a private bathroom and some including a classic bathtub in the room. The rooms include a view, with some having scenic Porto views. Each air-conditioned unit also has a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi access is available.

Guests can indulge in traditional Portuguese dishes served with a contemporary twist, at the Galeria do Largo Restaurant, the on-site restaurant.

The iconic Dom Luis I Bridge is just 550 metres away and its upper deck can be crossed either on foot or via Metro. The Porto Cathedral is 400 metres away. The riverfront Ribeira area is 300 metres away and features various waterfront eateries and a view to Vila Nova de Gaia. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 22 km from the Porto AS 1829 Hotel.

The bed and breakfast will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a outdoor furniture, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 40m²

The property features modern and bright accommodation in air-conditioned lofts and studios with a balcony. The living room and kitchen are open plan and have wooden floors. In the living area there are sofas, a flat-screen TV, DVD player, movies, dining table and iPod dock. The bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Guests are welcome to cook their own tasty meals in the equipped kitchen of their loft or studio. Alternatively, a variety of local restaurants is within a short 5-minute walk. The Porto cuisine is rich and features popular dishes like the famed Francesinha.

All suites at Rosa Et Al Townhouse have original wooden beams and plasterwork ceilings. They are decorated with vintage and modern furniture and have free WiFi. All offer a luxurious bathroom with a freestanding bathtub.

Gourmet meals with ingredients from the property's organic produce are served on the ground-floor living area, or in the gardens. Coffee, snacks and light meals are also available throughout the day.

Car and bicycle rentals are on offer, in order to explore Porto. Rosa Et Al Townhouse's concierge can take care of restaurant and museum reservations.

The townhouse is surrounded by galleries, artists’ studios and concept stores. Casa da Música is a 12-minute walk away, and Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport can be reached in a 20-minute drive.

Each of the elegant rooms features a TV, air conditioning and a minibar. The large bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. The units also feature a desk and a laptop safe. Free WiFi access is available and the hotel provides a 24-hour front desk service.

Breakfast is available and served each morning at the property. The Vincci’s restaurant serves traditional Portuguese meals and international dishes.Guests may also wish to pay a visit to the Porto centre, which features a wide variety of restaurants, many of which serving the famed Francesinha dish. The terrace offers panoramic views of the Arrábida Bridge and is open from April to October, subject the weather conditions.

The Serralves Modern Art Museum and its lush green gardens are at a 4.8 km distance. Within 4.4 km is the Arrábida Bridge, which connects with Vila Nova de Gaia, site of the Port Wine Cellars. The Porto centre features renowned landmarks such as the Clérigos Tower and the São Bento Train Station. Porto International Airport is a 17-minute drive from the Vincci Porto.

The property is around 2.9 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 3 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 3.5 km from Ribeira Square. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Campanha Train Station is 500 metres away.

This air-conditioned apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a cable flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like hiking.

Ferreira Borges Market is 3.7 km from Solar Studio Campanhã, while Clerigos Tower is 3.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Oportoflag center
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Attractively located in Porto, Oportoflag center is a sustainable apartment, which features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and free private parking. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

The apartment provides guests with a patio, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Oportoflag center include Oporto Coliseum, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Porto Riad - Guest House
description:
Located in the heart of Porto, the oriental-style Porto Riad - Guest House offers free Wi-Fi and a courtyard with thatched umbrellas. The warmly decorated rooms have colourful wall decorations and Moroccan lamps.

Porto Riad - Guest House is situated a 10-minute walk from the Trindade Metro Station. Porto’s historic city centre and the Porto Cathedral are a 15-minute walk away.

Porto Riad’s guest rooms are individually decorated in an Oriental theme and include a private bathroom and TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the Guest House.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the courtyard and have some mint tea at the Berber bar. The sofas in the reception lounge offer a relaxing setting to check the available city maps and tourist guides.

name: RIBEIRA by YoursPorto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Offering a riverside location and a stylish décor with exposed stone walls, Douro Apartments – RiverTop features 1-bedroom apartments in Porto Ribeira district. Free WiFi is provided.

All units have a seating area with a sofa and a TV, and some have a balcony with river view. Bedrooms have a double bed and each one has its own décor.

The kitchenette opens to the seating area and has all the appliances to prepare meals. The riverside location of the apartments allows guests to easily explore the Porto wine caves, located across the river.

Palácio da Bolsa is 2 minute’s walking from the apartments, and the iconic Torre dos Clérigos is less than 10 minutes’ walking.

Douro Apartments – RiverTop  is 22 km from Porto International Airport.

name: Casa Sá Noronha Old Town
description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 15m²
description:
Situated in Porto, 800 m from City Market Bolhao, Casa Sá Noronha Old Town features views of the city. The property is located 1 km from Palacio da Bolsa, 1 km from Ferreira Borges Market and 1 km from Oporto Coliseum. The accommodation features a shared kitchen and free WiFi.

All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a microwave, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. Guest rooms at the guest house are equipped with a seating area.

Clerigos Tower is 400 m from Casa Sá Noronha Old Town, while Lello Bookshop is 210 m from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Laurear Guest House
description:
Set in Porto, a 2-minute walk from Paris Galleries Street, Laurear Guest House features rooms with city views and free WiFi. Ideally set in the centre, the property is located 300 metres from Clerigos Tower and 500 metres from City Market Bolhao.

All rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

A daily breakfast basket is left at the guest rooms, each morning. Comprised of bread, croissants, jam, ham, cheese and coffee capsules.

Oporto Coliseum is 600 metres from Laurear Guest House, while Ferreira Borges Market is an 8-minute walk from the property. Porto Airport is 11 km away.

name: B The Guest Downtown
description:
Situated in the centre of Porto, facing the Bolhão Market, B The Guest Downtown offers air-conditioned rooms with modern style décor and free WiFi in all areas.

The 10 comfortable rooms offer views to the street or to the city rooftops and each includes flat-screen cable TV, a seating area, a desk and a minibar. Each has a private bathroom featuring free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer.

B The Guest Downtown has its own bar and snack bar. The breakfast can be served in the room or if guests prefer they can enjoy a breakfast buffet. A great variety of restaurants are available within 100 metres and at night guests can visit the bars 500 metres away.

Guests have a great amount of facilities and services at their disposal. Dry cleaning, laundry, ironing and grocery delivery can be done for a surcharge. B The Guest provides daily maid service, room service and safety deposit box in all rooms.

If guests need transportation to and from Porto International Airport, which is 17 Km away, a shuttle service can be arranged. With Bolhão Metro Station right across the street, guests can easily visit all the major attractions that Porto has to offer.

name: Pinheiro Terrace Downtown Apartment by DA'HOME
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 55m²
description:
In a central area of Porto, Pinheiro Terrace Downtown Apartment by DA'HOME features garden views from the terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom with a hair dryer, a seating area, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Pinheiro Terrace Downtown Apartment by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Domus 21 - Formosa
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 38m²
description:
Domus 21 - Formosa is located in downtown Porto within walking distance from the city centre and main attractions. Complimentary WiFi is featured at the apartments.

Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV, kitchenware and appliances.

Oporto Coliseum is 200 metres from the apartment. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 11 km from Domus 21 - Formosa.

name: Porto Downtown Main Str (S.Catarina) + Free Park
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
In the centre of Porto, located within a short distance of Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station, Porto Downtown Main Str (S.Catarina) + Free Park offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. This apartment provides free private parking and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Porto Downtown Main Str (S.Catarina) + Free Park.

name: Hotel Visconde
description:
Set in the Marquês area in Porto, the Hotel Visconde unit has a Metro Station under a 2-minute walk away. The Porto centre, in the Aliados Avenue is a 4-minute drive from the property.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Visconde come equipped with a private bathroom, satellite TV, telephone and free WiFi.

A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the Hotel Visconde. The nearest restaurant is just 100 metres from the property and the Porto centre has a multitude of restaurants serving traditional meals, including the city’s signature dishes, Francesinha and Tripas à Moda do Porto.

Guests can relax in the lounge area and access the internet, sit on the comfortable sofas or watch some TV.

Santa Catarina Street is Porto’s most active commercial street and is a 20-minute walk away. Dom Luis I Bridge is a 9-minute drive and connects with neighbouring Vila Nova de Gaia, where the Port Wine Cellars are sited. The iconic Clérigos Tower is a 7-minute drive away, as is the famed Lello Bookstore, which was recently voted as one of the most beautiful in the world. The Galerias de Paris is Porto’s main nightlife hotspot and is accessible through an 8-minute drive.

The Porto International Airport is a 12-minute drive from the Hotel Visconde.

name: Porto centro station
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Porto centro station is located in the Campanhã district of Porto, 2.1 km from Oporto Coliseum, 1.7 km from FC Porto Museum and 2.8 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property is around 2.9 km from Sao Bento Train Station, 3.4 km from Ribeira Square and 3.6 km from Ferreira Borges Market. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Campanha Train Station is 400 metres away.

Leading onto a balcony, the apartment consists of 1 bedroom. Providing a terrace, this apartment also provides guests with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette and 1 bathroom.

Clerigos Tower is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Estadio do Dragao is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from Porto centro station.

name: GuestReady - Gemini Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Located in Porto, 1.2 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 1.3 km from Oporto Coliseum, GuestReady - Gemini Apartment offers air conditioning. It is situated 1.3 km from Clerigos Tower and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.3 km away.

Popular points of interest near GuestReady - Gemini Apartment include Boavista Roundabout, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: ICON Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Conveniently located in the Ramalde district of Porto, ICON Apartments is a sustainable aparthotel set 2.4 km from Music House and 2.5 km from Boavista Roundabout. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. It is located 4.8 km from Clerigos Tower and provides full-day security. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also have free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a balcony. At the aparthotel, the units have bed linen and towels.

Palacio da Bolsa is 5.2 km from the aparthotel, while Ferreira Borges Market is 5.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 11 km from ICON Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Porto and with Oporto Coliseum reachable within 1.2 km, Fontinha Square Apartments by Porto City Hosts offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property features inner courtyard views and is 1.4 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The apartment has family rooms.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Clerigos Tower is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Palacio da Bolsa is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Fontinha Square Apartments by Porto City Hosts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Marquês Rooftop AL
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 37m²
description:
Located in Porto, 2 km from Oporto Coliseum and 2.5 km from FC Porto Museum, Marquês Rooftop AL provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. Campanha Train Station is 2.8 km away and Music House is 2.9 km from the apartment.

The recently renovated apartment comes with 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a an outdoor dining area and a flat-screen TV. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Sao Bento Train Station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Marquês Rooftop AL.

name: RS Porto Campanha
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
RS Porto Campanha is a property situated in Porto near Oporto Coliseum. This apartment also features free WiFi.

This air-conditioned 2-bedroom apartment comes with a kitchen, a seating area, a dining area and a cable flat-screen TV.

A car rental service is available at this property.

FC Porto Museum and  City Market Bolhao are 2.2 km from the apartment. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: GuestReady - Camões Refuge
description_short: Entire holiday home • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Located in Porto, 1.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.5 km from Sao Bento Train Station, GuestReady - Camões Refuge offers air conditioning. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the holiday home free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Oporto Coliseum.

The holiday home comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views.

Guests at GuestReady - Camões Refuge will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

Clerigos Tower is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Music House is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from GuestReady - Camões Refuge.

name: M Maison Particulière Porto
description:
Located in a 16th-century building in Porto old town, a UNESCO heritage site, the M Maison Particulière Porto offers the classic feel of a Paris hotel. A library and free WiFi are available.

Rooms are individually decorated with a timeless décor of unique furnishings, high ceilings, stucco details, and wall paintings.

Guests are served breakfast in the morning, and a 5-minute walk takes them to restaurants serving authentic local flavours.

The iconic D. Luís Bridge is 550 metres and the superior deck can be crossed on foot or by metro. Porto Cathedral is 400 metres and the Ribeira area is 400 metres from M Maison Particulière Porto.

Porto International Airport is 22 km away.

name: Sweet Bright Flats - City Center
description:
Sweet Bright Flats - City Center, a property with a garden, is set in Porto, 1.2 km from Campanha Train Station, 1 km from Oporto Coliseum, as well as 2 km from FC Porto Museum. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and outdoor furniture. Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, some units are soundproof.

The apartment complex has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 17 km from Sweet Bright Flats - City Center, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: DL 205
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, just 400 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 800 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, DL 205 offers accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is around 1.2 km from Ferreira Borges Market, 1.7 km from Campanha Train Station and 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near DL 205 include Sao Bento Train Station, Ribeira Square and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: GuestReady - CastleRock Pub
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 17m²
description:
Situated in the centre of Porto, 500 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 500 metres from Sao Bento Train Station, GuestReady - CastleRock Pub offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around 800 metres from Ferreira Borges Market, less than 1 km from Ribeira Square and 2.8 km from Music House. Boavista Roundabout is 3 km away and D. Luis I Bridge is 1.2 km from the apartment.

At the apartment complex, units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Oporto Coliseum and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from GuestReady - CastleRock Pub.

name: Home At Porto - Bolhão Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 48m²
description:
Porto Bolhao Apartments are located in front of the historic Bolhão Market. The unit is 200 metres from the Bolhão Metro Station and a mere 5-minute walk from Porto’s central Aliados Avenue.

The unit is set in a renovated 19th century building and includes a studio and a 1-bedroom apartment. The studio features a kitchenette, while the apartment comes with a kitchen. All come with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a comfortable living area, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen cable TV. Towels and linens are provided.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the kitchen or kitchenette at their disposal. Plenty of restaurants and cafés are accessible through a short 5-minute walk. The famed Café Majestic is 350 metres away.

The popular Ribeira area is a 20-minute walk and overlooks the Douro River. It is home to a variety of cafés, bars and eateries, where guests may enjoy Portuguese tapas and some quality wine. 750 metres away is the iconic Clérigos Tower, as well as the lively Galerias de Paris nightlife spot. Porto’s Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 15.5 km from the Porto Bolhao Apartments.

name: Boavista Studio 99 & Garage
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 46m²
description:
Boavista Studio 99 & Garage has a patio and is set in Porto, within just 500 metres of Boavista Roundabout and 1.8 km of Clerigos Tower. It is situated 2.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and offers private check-in and check-out. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Music House is 700 metres away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Sao Bento Train Station is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Palacio da Bolsa is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from Boavista Studio 99 & Garage.

name: Santa Catarina Guest House (Porto city center)
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, Santa Catarina Guest House (Porto city center) is a sustainable accommodation, which provides allergy-free rooms. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Featuring a private entrance, the guest house allows guests to maintain their privacy.

At the guest house, the units are equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the guest house, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Santa Catarina Guest House (Porto city center), and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: GuestReady - Fontainhas Art Gallery
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
In the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, close to Sao Bento Metro Station, GuestReady - Fontainhas Art Gallery has free WiFi and a washing machine. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market, and Clerigos Tower. The property is 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

Popular points of interest near GuestReady - Fontainhas Art Gallery include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: GuestReady - Boavista Breeze
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Porto, 1.3 km from Boavista Roundabout and 1.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, GuestReady - Boavista Breeze offers air conditioning. It is situated 1.5 km from Sao Bento Train Station and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Music House is 1.5 km away.

This apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room and a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Oporto Coliseum and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from GuestReady - Boavista Breeze.

name: InterContinental Porto - Palacio das Cardosas, an IHG Hotel
description:
Set in a renovated 18th-century palace, the 5-star InterContinental Porto - Palacio das Cardosas offers spacious rooms with views of Porto’s historical centre. Located 200 metres from the iconic Clérigos Tower, this hotel provides free WiFi in all areas.

Featuring high ceilings, Palacio’s stylish rooms offer flat-screen TVs. Marble bathrooms include a separate bathtub and walk-in shower. Some rooms feature a seating area with plush chairs.

Guests can workout at the 24-hour Fitness Centre, which is equipped with the latest equipment and weights. The on-site spa has 3 treatment rooms and a sauna.

The Restaurant Astoria offers a wide range of Portuguese dishes with a contemporary twist, as well as selection of Portuguese wines. The Cardosas Bar provides a relaxing setting, best enjoyed with a cocktail or a Port Wine glass. In the evening, guests can visit the lively Galerias de Paris 200 metres away.

Intercontinental Porto - Palacio das Cardosas is less than a 2-minute walk from São Bento Metro Station and 700 metres from the UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira area and the City Market Bolhão. Crossing the D. Luis I Bridge, 1 km away, guests can visit the famous Port Wine Cellars. Porto International Airport is located 15 km away.

name: Pause Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 21m²
description:
Located in Porto, 1.1 km from Campanha Train Station, Pause Apartments provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable apartment is located 1.1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 2 km from FC Porto Museum. Outdoor seating allows guests to enjoy the fresh air.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and D. Luis I Bridge. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Pause Apartments.

name: GuestReady - Uptown suites
description:
Set within 2 km of FC Porto Museum and 2.7 km of Oporto Coliseum in Porto, GuestReady - Uptown suites offers accommodation with seating area. It is located 1.6 km from Estadio do Dragao and provides a shared kitchen. The holiday home has family rooms.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite TV. With a private bathroom, units at the holiday home also feature free WiFi. At the holiday home, units come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

Sao Bento Metro Station is 3.4 km from GuestReady - Uptown suites, while Sao Bento Train Station is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Porto Coliseum Hotel
description:
Located in Porto Coliseum building, the recently refurbished Porto Coliseum Hotel offers modern themed rooms and a rooftop terrace bar, a few steps from Santa Catarina Street. Free WiFi is included.

Rooms evoke memories from past shows combined with an elegant and contemporary décor. Rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. Some have a seating area.

Breakfast is served daily in the rooftop breakfast room and includes fresh fruit, croissants, eggs and cereals. When the day is sunny, breakfast can be enjoyed outdoors, while gazing at the city. The Lounge Bar Coliseum offers stunning views over the city and provides a nice setting for a sunset drink.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can help guests with local tips and shuttle services. The iconic Bolhão Market is 350 metres away from Porto Coliseum Hotel. Aliados Avenue and Clérigos Tower are within a 10-minute walk.

The closest metro station is Bolhão, located within a 5-minute walk. Porto International Airport is around 18 km from the hotel.

name: Legends House by Sweet Porto
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 33m²
description:
Legends House by Sweet Porto features accommodation within 200 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a toaster, a fridge and a stovetop. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The aparthotel has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Units are fitted with a kettle, while certain rooms come with a balcony and others also boast garden views. At the aparthotel, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available each morning at the aparthotel.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property. A car rental service is available at Legends House by Sweet Porto.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Legends House by Sweet Porto, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Prédio da Estação
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 78m²
description:
A sustainable property, Prédio da Estação is located in Porto near Campanha Train Station, FC Porto Museum and Estadio do Dragao. The property is set 2.4 km from Oporto Coliseum, 3.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 3.6 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The apartment features family rooms.

The units come with a balcony, a well-equipped kitchen and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also provide guests with free WiFi, while some rooms here will provide you with a terrace. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Clerigos Tower is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Ribeira Square is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Prédio da Estação.

name: Poveira Hotel
description:

Breakfast service is available and is complimentary. Guests may use the hostel’s equipped communal kitchen in order to cook up their own meals. The nearby Porto centre has a wide range of traditional Portuguese and international restaurants for guests to discover.

The historical centre is a UNESCO World Heritage and features several popular landmarks. The Clérigos Tower is 2.2 km away, while the Lello Bookstore and lively Galerias de Paris are both 2.3 km away from the hostel. São Bento Train Station is 2 km from the property. Facing the S. João National Theatre and the cosmopolitan Batalha Square, the NH Collection Porto's elegant rooms come with double or twin beds and private bathrooms with bath or shower, bidet, hairdryer and free toiletries. Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a seating area, a safety deposit box, a minibar, a coffee machine and an electric kettle.

The NH Collection provides its guests a reinvigorating breakfast buffet each morning and serves meals at the on-site restaurant. In the evening guests can enjoy a beverage at the hotel’s bar. The centre of all nightlife is just 700 metres away at the Galerias de Paris.

With a 24-hour front desk the NH Collection Porto Batalha includes exclusive facilities like sauna, fitness centre and a relaxing indoor pool. Guests can request massages, laundry and dry cleaning services.

The World Heritage Ribeira area, 1 km away, offers a great variety of restaurants and snack bars where guests can enjoy the most traditional Porto dishes and tapas while gazing at the Douro River and the D. Luis I Bridge. Across the Douro, guests can visit the Port Wine cellars and enjoy a panoramic view of the city. Porto International Airport is 17 km away.

Alternatively, guests are welcome to visit the great variety of restaurants serving traditional Porto cuisine. In the evening there are plenty of bars in the vicinity where guests can relax and enjoy the unique view.

Due to its prime location, guests staying at Porto River aparthotel can easily visit most major landmarks in the centre of Porto. The iconic Clérigos Tower and the Lello Bookstore are 850 metres away while the Sé Cathedral is just a 10-minute walk away. The Aliados Avenue and the picturesque São Bento Train Station are a 13-minute walk away. Porto International Airport is 14 km away.

This apartment includes 2 double rooms, 1 single room and 2 bathrooms. The living area features a sofa, a flat-screen cable TV and a dining area. The apartment’s simple yet comfortable furniture makes it perfect for a weekend getaway.

Guests can prepare their own meals in the fully equipped kitchen. In addition guests can visit the great variety of traditional Portuguese restaurants in the vicinity. At night guests can enjoy a beverage at the bars in the Ribeira area by the Douro River 500 metres away.

São Bento Transport Hub is 250 metres away allowing guests to access metro, train, bus and taxi transportation. Clérigos Tower is a 7-minute walk away and the Cristal Palace is 1.7 km away. Porto International Airport is 18 km away.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from GuestReady - The Other Side.

description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 78m²
description:
Casas do Porto - Ribeira Apartments offers one and two-bedroom apartments in Porto’s iconic Ribeira district, a 5-minute walk from São Bento Train Station. These units are fully renovated and offer views of Dom Luís Bridge.

Each apartment includes a living room with a sofa and a cable TV. The elegant bedrooms feature cushioned headboards, and all apartments offer free WiFi access. The bathroom comes with free Yves Rocher toiletries and a hairdryer.

The kitchenette is fully equipped with all the utensils to prepare meals, and guests will find complimentary fruit, coffee and tea. Every morning and for an additional cost, Casas do Porto - Ribeira Apartments can deliver a breakfast basket with bread, croissants, milk, juice, yogurt, cereals, cheese and ham.

The Palácio da Bolsa (Stock Exchange Palace) is within 100 metres from Casas do Porto - Ribeira Apartments, featuring a 19th-century neoclassic architecture. The lively summer terraces of the Ribeira area are less than 500 metres, offering views of the Porto wine cellars across the river.

Porto International Airport is located 12 km away from Casas do Porto - Ribeira Apartments, and the well-known Torre dos Clérigos is within a 5-minute walk, as well as Galerias Paris entertainment district.

A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Casa Antiga include Ribeira Square, Music House and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: BO - Bolhão Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:
A restored 19th century building houses these bright, modern apartments, located next to the iconic Bolhão Market. The BO - Bolhão Apartments offers self-catering units with free WiFi access.

All air-conditioned units include a fully equipped kitchenette, allowing guests to prepare their own meals with the fresh products bought at Bolhão Market, located across the street. Some apartments have a balcony. All apartments have an espresso machine and free coffee and tea.

The seating area opens to the kitchenette and includes a sofa bed, a flat-screen cable TV, DVD player and a movie library with over 60 films. The private bathroom includes a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

Rua de Santa Catarina shopping street is less than 2 minutes’ walking, and includes the Belle Époque symbol, Cafe Majestic, amongst world-class shops. A few steps, guests will find restaurants where the best francesinhas are served.

Bolhão Metro Station is 30 metres away, and São Bento Train Station is 500 metres from BO - Bolhão Apartments. The Ribeira area is reached after a 20-minute walk and features riverside summer terraces with live music.

The fully equipped apartments and studios are elegantly decorated with unique details and include daily cleaning and daily breakfast for guests’ convenience.

Set on a privileged area, My Ribeira Guest House is the perfect starting point to taste the local gastronomy. Restaurants, cafés and bars are within a few minutes’ walk. Galerias de Paris, Porto’s prime nightlife area is just 700 metres away while the pedestrian commercial Santa Catarina Street is a 14-minute walk away.

Guests can cross the Douro River through the D. Luis I Bridge and find the renowned Port Wine cellars just a 10-minute walk away. The iconic Clérigos Tower and the picturesque Lello Bookshop are 650 metres away. Porto International Airport is 13 km away.

Guests have easy access to public transports, and the São Bento Railway Station is less than 10 minutes’ walking. Porto International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Crowne Plaza Porto, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located on the Avenida da Boavista, in the heart of the city’s business and cultural district, the modern Crowne Plaza Porto exudes pure luxury and comfort. This 5-star hotel is situated 900 metres from Casa da Música.

Only a few kilometres from Porto’s beautiful beaches, Crowne Plaza Porto (formerly Tiara Park Atlantic Porto) is the perfect choice. Enjoy magnificent views from the comfort of your spacious room or venture out into the city. All public and privates spaces are elegantly furnished, radiating a warm and cosy atmosphere.

The helpful reception staff is at your service 24 hours a day and will do its best to ensure you have a relaxing and memorable stay. Sample delicious local specialities at the restaurant or take a walk in the hotel garden. For business travellers looking to combine work with pleasure, on-site meeting facilities are available. Free access to digital newspapers is provided to guests.

Crowne Plaza Porto is situated just 700 metres from the Botanic Gardens of Porto and 2 km from the lush Serralves Gardens and Museum. The Bessa Football Stadium is just 250 metres away the Porto International Airport is 11 km away.

The air conditioned rooms come with hardwood floors and some rooms with a view. All rooms feature a private bathroom. Free WiFi is provided.

Featuring an à la carte restaurant, the property has lighter meals and Portuguese snacks. The unit also features a bar, where guests may taste quality Portuguese wines. The surrounding area has a wide range of restaurants, where guests may try traditional Portuguese meals.

There is a shared lounge area, with comfortable sofas and a small library. Guests may take a quiet break in the green garden, or try the pool, located a 5-minute walk at a nearby property.

The centennial Lello Bookstore is a mere 3-minute walk away. Also in the vicinity are the Galerias de Paris, the city’s main bar and nightlife area which is just 2 minutes away on foot. The São Bento Train and Metro Stations are a 5-minute walk away. Porto International Airport is an 18-minute drive from Your GuestHouse Porto.

Aliados Avenue and Clérigos Tower are around 20 minutes' walking from Antero Quental Residence. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 10 km from the property, and Faria Guimarães Metro Station is a 5-minute walk.

name: Grande Hotel do Porto
description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 47m²
description:

The elegant rooms at the Grande Hotel do Porto include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath tub and shower.

With a romantic atmosphere, D. Pedro II Restaurant is located in a restored ballroom. It serves authentic Portuguese cuisine prepared with local ingredients and with some vegetables grown in the rooftop vegetable garden. Drinks can be enjoyed at the Windsor Bar. The property's rooftop terrace features scenic 360º views over Porto's historic centre and its colourful rooftops

Guests can admire panoramic Porto views from the terrace, train in the 24-hour fitness room or relax with a massage.

Convenient facilities at the Grande Hotel do Porto include laundry services, babysitting services and currency exchange.

Grande Hotel do Porto is steps from Bolhão Bus and Metro Station and 10 minutes from the Serra do Pilar Monastery by foot. The Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 15 km from the hotel.

Popular points of interest near Get Cozy include Boavista Roundabout, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

centre of Porto. Free WiFi access is available. The property is a 10-minute walk from the Trindade Metro Station.

description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 63m²
description:
Located in the historic centre of Porto, in the pedestrian street Rua das Flores, Myo Design House provides a comfortable stay in suites and studios. Parking is available 80 metres away.

The renovated building was once part of the very first large hospital of the city in the 17th century. Retaining its original façade, Myo’s suites and studios offer a modern yet vintage décor and are fully equipped.

In the vicinity there is a great variety of local restaurants, trendy shops and bars with esplanades. The centre of Porto’s nightlife, Galerias de Paris, is a 7-minute walk away. Crossing the D. Luis I Bridge, 500 metres away, guests can visit the famous Port Wine Cellars.

Myo Design House is a 2-minute walk from São Bento Metro Station, 300 metres from the UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira area and the City Market Bolhão. The iconic Clérigos Tower and Lello Bookstore are a 5-minute walk from the property. Porto International Airport is located 15 km away.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
Located in the centre of Porto’s historical area, Porto Central Flats is a 5-minute walk from the main Aliados Avenue. The self-catering units are a 5-minute walk away from the Ribeira area.

The apartments and studios come with a living room area with sofas, free WiFi, private bathroom, a fully-equipped kitchen or kitchenette, a flat-screen satellite TV and air conditioning.

Guests are welcome to prepare their meals in the equipped kitchens or kitchenettes of the apartments and studios. The Ribeira area is 300 metres away and features a number of local restaurants and cafés, where guests can enjoy traditional Portuguese meals and tapas. The region is also famed for the typical Francesinha and Tripas à Moda do Porto dishes.

The iconic Clérigos Tower is a 5-minute walk away and stands beside the Galerias Paris, Porto’s main nightlife and bar hotspot. The famed Lello Bookstore is also a 5-minute walk away. The property is a 5-minute walk from the Hard Club, where regular concerts and exhibits are held. The Dom Luis I Bridge is a 10-minute walk away and connects with neighbouring Vila Nova de Gaia’s riverside, where the Port Wine Cellars are sited.

The Porto International Airport is an 18-minute drive from the Porto Central Flats. The São Bento Train and Metro stations are a 3-minute walk away.

name: Largo São Domingos by Innapartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
The Largo São Domingos by Innapartments is located steps from Porto’s historical Ribeira, which faces Douro River. Each featuring a cast-iron balcony with a view, the units are 550 metres from the São Bento Train and Metro stations.

The uniquely decorated apartments and studios feature exposed stone walls and plenty of natural light. Each is heated and has a living area with sofa, Smart TV and a double bed. The apartments and studios come with a fully equipped kitchenette, including an espresso coffee machine.

Guests may choose to stay in and cook their own meals in the kitchenette, enjoying them in the dining area. Alternatively, the surrounding area is filled with traditional Porto restaurants, many within a short 3-minute walk. Aliados Avenue is a 6-minute walk and also has various eatery options.

At just 100 metres from the Largo São Domingos by Innapartments is the Bolsa Palace, which boasts a neoclassical 19th century architecture. The iconic Dom Luis I Bridge is 600 metres away and connects with Vila Nova de Gaia, site of the Port Wine Cellars. The Clérigos Tower and the lively bars of Galerias de Paris are at a 5-minute walk. Largo São Domingos by Innapartments is 12 km from the Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport, which is accessible via Metro.

name: Charming House Marquês

Featuring access to a pleasant terrace with garden areas, Charming House offers various types of suites equipped with flat-screen TV, heating, wooden floors and private bathrooms. Some rooms are interconnected and offer views of the streets, the garden and the terrace.

At night, tea, coffee and cookies are provided. A great variety of eateries from the most traditional to the most simple is within walking distance.

The very centre of Porto, Aliados Avenue is a 10-minute Metro trip and the World Heritage Ribeira area is 2.6 km away. Across the Douro River through the D. Luís I Bridge guests can visit the famous Port Wine Cellars. The Marquês Metro Sation and the emblematic Santa Catarina Street featuring traditional commerce and neoclassical buildings are a 3-minute walk away. Porto International Airport is 15 km away.

All apartments are equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with toiletries, towels and bed linen. It has free WiFi.

Seventyset Flats provides a welcome basket with breakfast groceries and all the apartments have a complimentary bottle of wine and water. Meals can be prepared in the kitchenette and enjoyed in the dining area featured in all apartments. Alternatively, a variety of local restaurants nearby in Ribeira, Rua das Flores and Mouzinho da Silveira Street. Within a 10-minute walk is Galerias de Paris, known as one of the main nightlife spots of Porto.

The property is a 5-minute walk from Ribeira. Palácio da Bolsa is 260 metres away, while Ferreira Borges Market is at 350 metres. It is a 10-minute walk  from the Avenida dos Aliados and 950 metres from São Bento Station. The famous Centennial Lello Bookshop and The Clérigos Tower are both at a 13-minute walk. name: Legendary Porto Hotel
description:
Centrally located on Batalha Square, Legendary Porto Hotel is a 5-minute walk from São Bento Metro Station. The recently-renovated property features a bar and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

The soundproofed rooms at Legendary Porto Hotel have new furnishings and blackout curtains. Each comes equipped with tea and coffee-making facilities and include a seating area with sofa and a flat-screen TV. En suite bathrooms come with hairdryer.

The Legendary's breakfast area was also subject of a full renovation, including brand new buffet equipment where the daily continental breakfast is served. Gluten and lactose free options are available for breakfast upon previous request. Guests are welcome to discover the wide range of popular restaurants and eateries in the surrounding area, many of which serving traditional Porto delicacies.

The property's lifts were subject of a full renovation and are now silent and ecological. Guests can relax in the contemporary lounge with flat-screen TVs. An attentive staff can help with car rental and laundry facilities and is available 24/7. The hotel also features a small fitness centre, which is available to guests 24/7.

A 30 minute-drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, Legendary Porto Hotel is also a 7-minute walk from Bolhão Metro Station. The renowned Porto Wine Cellars are less than 3 km away, and the promenade on the Douro River with the iconic D. Luís Bridge is 300 metres away.
